CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.aca_cb_check_income_theo_booking_thanh_phan_chi_tiet_view`
AS with booking_info as
(
SELECT 
  bs.id as booking_id,
  (select bp.subject from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.id = bs.program_id) as subject,
  (select bp.program_type from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.id = bs.program_id) as program_type,
  bs.total_income,
  bs.begin_at as booking_time,
  bs.rating,
  bs.status_id,
  if(bs.status_id=7 and bs.is_rating_approved=1, bs.income,0) as kyna_compensation,

  (select max(p.`name`) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = bs.teacher_id) as teacher_name,
  case
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 1 then 'Philippines'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 2 then 'Native'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 3 then 'Vietnamese'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 4 then 'Thailand'
    when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 5 then 'Indonesia'
  when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 8 then 'Laos'
  when (select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = bs.teacher_id) = 9 then 'Malaysia'
  end as teacher_country,
  (select bp.number_of_shift from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.id = bs.program_id ) as num_shift,
  bs.teacher_id,
  (select bt.teacher_source from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bs.teacher_id = bt.user_id) as teacher_source,
  
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs
inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on bs.id = bss.booking_session_id 
where bs.program_id not in (select id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` where type in (4)) 
      and  bs.program_id!=3
      and bs.status_id not in (1,2,3,4)
      and format_datetime("%Y-%m", bs.begin_at) >= '2025-05'

),

sellingEx as
(select ex.date, ex.sellingEx, ex.teacherCountry,
        lead (ex.date) over (partition by ex.teacherCountry order by ex.date) as next_applied_date
        from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_teacher_income_ex` ex
),

income_booking_teacher_details as
(
select 
  format_datetime("%Y-%m", t1.booking_time) as year_month,
  t1.booking_id,
  t1.num_shift,
  t1.teacher_name,
  t1.teacher_country,
  t1.teacher_id,
  t1.rating,
  t1.status_id,
  t1.subject,
  t1.program_type,
  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_teacher_source`(t1.teacher_source) as teacher_source,
  
  
  coalesce(max(bsi.income),0) as base_rate_income,                                                       --bs
  coalesce(max(bsi.performance_bonus),0) as performance_bonus,                                           --bs
  coalesce(max(bsi.replacement_bonus),0) as replacement_bonus,                                           --brb
  coalesce(max(bsi.hot_bonus_income),0) as hot_bonus_income,                                             --bsi
  coalesce(max(bsi.bonus_test_online_early_review),0) as bonus_test_online_early_review,                 --bsi
  coalesce(max(bsi.bonus_test_online_golden_hour),0) as bonus_test_online_golden_hour,                   --bsi
  coalesce(max(kyna_compensation),0) as kyna_compensation,
  
  coalesce(-max(bsi.rating_below_standard_penalty),0) as rating_below_standard_penalty,
  coalesce(-max(bsi.open_webcam_below_standard_penalty),0) as open_webcam_below_standard_penalty,        -- i
  coalesce(-max(bsi.full_face_below_standard_penalty),0) as full_face_below_standard_penalty,            ---
  coalesce(-max(bsi.etiquette_violation_penalty),0) as etiquette_violation_penalty,                      --- -max-bsi
  coalesce(-max(bsi.cancel_penalty_income),0) as cancel_penalty_income,                                  --bs
  
  
  coalesce(max(bsi.income),0)                                             
  + coalesce(max(bsi.performance_bonus),0)                                    
  + coalesce(max(bsi.replacement_bonus),0)                                    
  + coalesce(max(bsi.hot_bonus_income),0)                                     
  + coalesce(max(bsi.bonus_test_online_early_review),0)                 
  + coalesce(max(bsi.bonus_test_online_golden_hour),0)  
  + coalesce(max(kyna_compensation),0)                
  - coalesce(max(bsi.rating_below_standard_penalty),0)
  - coalesce(max(bsi.open_webcam_below_standard_penalty),0)        
  - coalesce(max(bsi.full_face_below_standard_penalty),0)             
  - coalesce(max(bsi.etiquette_violation_penalty),0)                       
  - coalesce(max(bsi.cancel_penalty_income),0) as total_income_calculated,                                

  -- coalesce(max(t1.total_income),0) as total_income,                                                      
  -- max(t2.sellingEx) as sellingEx,
  -- coalesce(max(t1.total_income),0) * max(t2.sellingEx) as total_income_vnd
  
  
from booking_info t1
inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on t1.booking_id = bss.booking_session_id
left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_income_view` bsi on t1.booking_id = bsi.booking_session_id
join sellingEx t2 on date(t1.booking_time) >= t2.date and (date(t1.booking_time) < t2.next_applied_date or t2.next_applied_date is null) and t1.teacher_country = t2.teacherCountry
where format_datetime("%Y-%m", t1.booking_time) >= '2025-05'
group by year_month, t1.booking_id, t1.program_type, t1.num_shift, t1.rating, t1.status_id, t1.subject, t1.teacher_name, t1.teacher_country, t1.teacher_id, t1.teacher_source
order by year_month desc 
)
,


result_temp as
(
select 
      ibt.year_month,
      ibt.teacher_id,
      ibt.teacher_name,
      ibt.teacher_country,
      ibt.teacher_source,

      countif(ibt.program_type = 1 and ibt.rating = 2 and ibt.status_id = 5 and ibt.subject = 1) as num_teaching_booking_with_pf_bonus_english,
  
      countif(ibt.program_type = 1 and ibt.rating = 2 and ibt.status_id = 5 and ibt.subject = 2) as num_teaching_booking_with_pf_bonus_math,
      
      countif(ibt.program_type = 1 and ibt.rating = 2 and ibt.status_id = 5) as num_teaching_booking_with_pf_bonus,
      
      SUM(CASE WHEN ibt.program_type = 1 and ibt.subject = 1 THEN performance_bonus ELSE 0 END) AS performance_bonus_teaching_english,
      
      SUM(CASE WHEN ibt.program_type = 1 and ibt.subject = 2 THEN performance_bonus ELSE 0 END) AS performance_bonus_teaching_math,

      SUM(CASE WHEN ibt.program_type = 2 THEN performance_bonus ELSE 0 END) AS performance_bonus_test,
      
            -- count(distinct b)
      sum(base_rate_income) as base_rate_income,
      -- sum(performance_bonus) as performance_bonus_temp,     
      sum(performance_bonus) as performance_bonus,                                           --bs
      sum(replacement_bonus) as replacement_bonus,                                           --brb
      sum(hot_bonus_income) as hot_bonus_income,                                             --bsi
      sum(bonus_test_online_early_review) as bonus_test_online_early_review,                 --bsi
      sum(bonus_test_online_golden_hour) as bonus_test_online_golden_hour,                   --bsi

      sum(rating_below_standard_penalty) as rating_below_standard_penalty,
      sum(open_webcam_below_standard_penalty) as open_webcam_below_standard_penalty,        --bsi
      sum(full_face_below_standard_penalty) as full_face_below_standard_penalty,            --bsi
      sum(etiquette_violation_penalty) as etiquette_violation_penalty,                      --bsi
      sum(cancel_penalty_income) as cancel_penalty_income,                                  --bs
      sum(if(kyna_compensation>0,kyna_compensation,0)) as income_kyna_compensation,

      -- round(sum(total_income_calculated),2) as total_income_calculated_temp,
      
      round(sum(total_income_calculated),2) as total_income_calculated,

      -- sum(total_income) as total_income,

      -- max(sellingEx) as sellingEx,
      
      -- round(sum(total_income_vnd),2) as total_income_vnd

from income_booking_teacher_details ibt
-- where teacher_id = 1505174
group by year_month, teacher_id, teacher_name, teacher_country, teacher_source
--having total_income_calculated != 0
order by year_month desc --total_income_vnd desc
)

select
       *,


from result_temp r
where      
      total_income_calculated != 0
order by year_month desc
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.aca_ops_hoc_vien_gvcd_view`
AS --Nhờ bên anh làm thêm 1 cái Datastudio chi tiết danh sách HVCĐ nhé ạ, bao gồm các thông tin:
-- Teacher ID
-- Teacher Name
-- Mã KE HVCĐ
-- Tên học viên
-- Ops In Charge
-- Loại học viên: Trẻ em/người lớn
-- Tên chương trình
-- Số buổi còn lại

with 
-- HV chương trình số buổi còn lại
target_student_1 AS (
SELECT bs.user_id, bs.student_code, 
       bsp.program_id,
       count(distinct bsn.id) as num_bookings, 
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn
        ON (bs.user_id = bssn.student_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp
        ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
        ON (bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id and bsp.program_id = bsn.program_id)

WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0
      -- and bs.country_id = 3
      AND bsp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id = 3 or bp.type in (2,3,4)) 
      AND bsn.status_id in (4,5)
      AND bsn.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id = 3 or bp.type in (2,3,4))
  	  AND cast(bsn.begin_at as datetime) < current_datetime("UTC+7")     
      --AND (date(bsn.begin_at) >= '2024-10-01' AND date(bsn.begin_at) <= '2024-10-31') 
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính tổng số lesson còn lại của học sinh ở các chương trình mà học sinh đang học với các ràng buộc như trên 
remaining_bookings_program AS (
SELECT bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id,
       max(coalesce(bsp.remain_lesson,0)) as bookings_program_remain
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0 
      AND bsp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id = 3 or bp.type in (2,3,4))
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính số booking đã được chạy ở các trạng thái draft, new, waiting approve, approved (lấy ở ngày hiện tại trở đi)
remaining_bookings_booked AS (
SELECT 
      bs.user_id, 
      bs.student_code, 
      bsp.program_id, 
      count(distinct bsn.id) as bookings_booked
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn
        ON (bs.user_id = bssn.student_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
        ON (bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id and bsp.program_id = bsn.program_id)
WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0 
      AND bsn.status_id in (1,2,3,4)
      AND bsn.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id = 3 or bp.type in (2,3,4))
      AND cast(bsn.begin_at as datetime) > current_datetime("UTC+7")
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính tổng số booking còn lại của học viên (lấy 2 số trên cộng lại với nhau)
remaining_bookings AS (
SELECT rbp.user_id, rbp.student_code, rbp.program_id,-- rbp.program_name, 
       max(coalesce(rbp.bookings_program_remain,0)) + max(coalesce(rbb.bookings_booked,0)) as total_remaining_lessons,
       --`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_student_name_from_profile_by_student_id`(rbp.user_id) as student_name 
FROM remaining_bookings_program rbp
LEFT JOIN remaining_bookings_booked rbb ON(rbp.user_id = rbb.user_id AND rbp.program_id = rbb.program_id)
WHERE rbp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id = 3 or bp.type in (2,3,4))
GROUP BY rbp.user_id, rbp.student_code, rbp.program_id
),

-- Ghép các bảng trên để có bảng target_students
students_with_remain_bookings AS
(
SELECT 
      ts1.*,
      -- rb.program_id, 
      --rb.program_name, rb.subject, 
      rb.total_remaining_lessons,  
FROM target_student_1 ts1
LEFT JOIN remaining_bookings rb ON(ts1.user_id = rb.user_id AND ts1.program_id = rb.program_id)
where rb.total_remaining_lessons > 0
),

-- students_with_remain_bookings as
-- (
-- select 
--        ts.student_code,
--        ts.program_id
--        sum(ts.total_remaining_lessons) as total_remaining_lessons,
        
-- from target_students ts
-- group by student_code 
-- ),

-- HV và GVCĐ
hv_gvcd as
(
select
      bst.student_code,
      (
        SELECT
              max(p.name)
        FROM
              `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p
        where p.user_id = bspd.student_id
      ) as student_name,

      bt.user_id as teacher_id,
      (
        SELECT
              max(p.name)
        FROM
             `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p
        WHERE
              p.user_id= bt.user_id) as teacher_name,
      
      bspd.program_id,
      (select bp.name from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.id = bspd.program_id) as program,




from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_priority_date` bspd
inner join `kynaforkids.booking_student` bst on bst.user_id = bspd.student_id
inner join `kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt on bt.user_id = bspd.fixed_teacher_id
where bspd.fixed_teacher_id is not null and bspd.only_map_current_teacher = 1
      -- and student_id = 102
      and bst.student_code like 'K%'
      and bspd.program_id in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 1 and bp.type not in (2,3,4) and bp.id != 3)
group by student_code, student_id, teacher_id, program_id
)

select 
        hv_gvcd.*,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country_teacher`((select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = hv_gvcd.teacher_id)) as teacher_country,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_student_country`(bst.country_id) as student_country,
        srb.total_remaining_lessons,
        case when bst.user_type_id = 1 then 'Trẻ em'
             when bst.user_type_id = 2 then 'Người lớn'
             else "Unknown"
        end as loai_hv,
        (select `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_email_from_kynaforkids_user`(bst.ops_id)) as ops_email,   

        
from hv_gvcd 
inner join `kynaforkids.booking_student` bst on bst.student_code = hv_gvcd.student_code
left join students_with_remain_bookings srb on hv_gvcd.student_code = srb.student_code and hv_gvcd.program_id = srb.program_id
where srb.total_remaining_lessons is not null

;

(
  affiliate_id INT64,
  affiliate_email STRING,
  phone_number STRING,

  source STRING,

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.booking_program_view`
AS select *,
       case when program_type = 1 then  
                                        (case when id in (14,41,6,15,21,22,23,16,9,42,73,74,77,78) then 50
                                              when id in (46,64,65,102) then 60
                                              when name like '%25%' then 25
                                              when name like '%45%' then 45
                                              when name like '%90%' then 90
                                              when name like '%50%' then 50
                                              when number_of_shift = 1 then 25
                                              when number_of_shift = 2 then 45
                                              when number_of_shift = 3 then 90  
                                         end    
                                        )
            when program_type = 2 then  (case when number_of_shift = 1 then 25
                                              when name like "%Toán_Test%" and number_of_shift = 2 then 45
                                              when number_of_shift = 2 then 50
                                              when number_of_shift = 3 then 90

                                         end
                                        )
        end as num_minutes
from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp
where bp.id not in (3,88)
order by program_type desc;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.booking_session_student_view2`
AS SELECT * 
      
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids_material_view.staged_booking_session_student` bss
where date(timestamp_seconds(bss.created_at)) >= '2025-01-01';

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.booking_session_view2`
AS SELECT * except(begin_at,end_at,created_at,updated_at,last_action_at,teacher_note_at),
      timestamp_seconds(begin_at) as begin_at,
      timestamp_seconds(end_at) as end_at,
      timestamp_seconds(created_at) as created_at,
      timestamp_seconds(updated_at) as updated_at,
      timestamp_seconds(last_action_at) as last_action_at,
      timestamp_seconds(teacher_note_at) as teacher_note_at,

      case when bs.status_id = 5 then 'Completed'
           when bs.status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id in (2,5,6,9,12) then 'Cancel không bù'
      end as completed_or_ko_bu,

      case when (bs.total_income is null or bs.total_income = 0) then 'income_null_0'
           else 'income_occured'
      end as income_type
      
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids_material_view.staged_booking_session` bs
where date(timestamp_seconds(begin_at)) >= '2025-01-01';

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.booking_sesssion_ops_bonus_since_06_2025_view`
AS SELECT * except(begin_at,end_at,created_at,updated_at,last_action_at,teacher_note_at),
      timestamp_seconds(begin_at) as begin_at,
      timestamp_seconds(end_at) as end_at,
      timestamp_seconds(created_at) as created_at,
      timestamp_seconds(updated_at) as updated_at,
      timestamp_seconds(last_action_at) as last_action_at,
      timestamp_seconds(teacher_note_at) as teacher_note_at,

      case when bs.status_id = 5 then 'Completed'
           when bs.status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id in (2,5,6,9,12) then 'Cancel không bù'
      end as completed_or_ko_bu,

      case when (bs.total_income is null or bs.total_income = 0) then 'income_null_0'
           else 'income_occured'
      end as income_type
      
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session` bs
where begin_at >= 1746032400;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.ceo_ghi_danh_lai_INDO_view_temp`
AS with general_table as (
SELECT
  -- CAST(FORMAT_TIMESTAMP("%d/%m/%Y", (bl.created_at)) AS STRING) AS register_created
    bl.id
  , bl.status
  , bl.utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign
  , bl.reason_cancel_id
  , bl.created_at
  , bo.invoice_code
  , bo.payment_content
  , bo.total
  , bo.payment_status
  , bo.status as booking_order_status
  , bo.discount_money
  , bo.currency_exchange_rate
  , date(bo.created_at) as order_date
 
  , `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_lead_status`(bl.status) as lead_status
  , (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as affiliate_category
  , (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and u.id = au.user_id ) as affiliate_email
  , (SELECT max(p.name) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p WHERE p.user_id = bl.sale_id) AS sale_follow
    , (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = bl.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email
  -- ngaltt start
    ,(SELECT max(p.name) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p WHERE p.user_id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor
  , (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,

    -- (select date(bsn.begin_at)
    -- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_new` bsn
    -- where bsn.id = bl.booking_test_id) as test_date,

    bl.booking_test_id,
    bl.sale_id,
    -- (select bsn.status_id,
    -- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_new` bsn
    -- where bsn.id = bl.booking_test_id) as booking_test_status

    -- ngaltt start
 `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(bo.payment_content) AS loai_don_hang
, IF(bo.payment_content = 1, 1, 0) as hoc_thu
, IF(bo.payment_content = 2, 1, 0) as ghi_danh_lan_dau
, IF(bo.payment_content = 3, 1, 0) as tra_gop_lan_sau
, IF(bo.payment_content = 4, 1, 0) as ghi_danh_lai
, (CASE WHEN bl.upsell = 1 THEN 'Upsell' ELSE 'Lead' END) AS loai_lead
, (CASE WHEN bl.is_blocked = 0 THEN 'Open'  ELSE 'Blocked' END) AS trang_thai
    -- ngaltt end
, if((select max(u.id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u,
  (select parent_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = bst.user_id and bst.is_user_test != 1) t1
  where u.id = t1.parent_id and u.phone_number = bl.intl_phone_number) is null, 'Chưa là HV', 'Đã là HV') as HV_Yes_No
, case
    when bl.subject_code = 'EK' then 'Tiếng Anh trẻ em'
    when bl.subject_code = 'EA' then 'Tiếng Anh người lớn'
    when bl.subject_code = 'M' then 'Toán'
    when bl.subject_code = 'C' then 'Group Class'
    when bl.subject_code = 'AI' then 'AI Tutor'
    when bl.subject_code = 'AI-PRE' then 'AI Tutor Premium'
  end as subject_code
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bl
-- ngaltt start
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = bl.sale_id
-- ngaltt end
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo ON bl.id = bo.lead_id
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.auth_assignment` aa ON aa.user_id = bl.sale_id
WHERE bl.country_id = 2
-- AND aa.item_name IN('Telesales', 'Lead Telesales','SALE - Manager','SALE - Telesales - Staff','SALE - Telesales Supervisor')
AND bl.Upsell = 1
),

lead_table as
(
select 
        date(created_at) as lead_date, 
        sale_id,
        affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email,
        trang_thai,
        count(distinct id) as num_leads,   

      SUM(
            if(status in (6,12),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      
      SUM(
          if(reason_cancel_id in ('20') and status in (9),1,0)
      ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,

      SUM(
            if(status in (3,4,5),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(
            if(status in (21,22),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(
          if(reason_cancel_id not in ('20') and status in (9),1,0)
      ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(
            if(status in (9),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi
from general_table
where date(created_at) >= '2024-01-01'
  -- and date(created_at) >= '2025-01-20'
  group by lead_date, sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email
  order by lead_date desc
),

order_info as (
select 
        bo.invoice_code,
        bo.created_by as sale_id,
        bo.payment_content,
        bo.total,
        bo.total_video_course,
        bo.payment_status,
        bo.status,
        bo.discount_money,
        bo.currency_exchange_rate,
        date(bo.created_at) as order_date,
        bl.utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign,
        (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as affiliate_category,
         (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
           `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and u.id = au.user_id ) as affiliate_email,
        case
          when bl.subject_code = 'EK' then 'Tiếng Anh trẻ em'
          when bl.subject_code = 'EA' then 'Tiếng Anh người lớn'
          when bl.subject_code = 'M' then 'Toán'
          when bl.subject_code = 'C' then 'Group Class'
          when bl.subject_code = 'AI' then 'AI Tutor'
          when bl.subject_code = 'AI-PRE' then 'AI Tutor Premium'
        end as subject_code,
        bo.lead_id,

from `kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
left join `kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl on bl.id = bo.lead_id
where bo.status in (4) and bo.payment_status in (0,1,3,4)
      and bo.international_country_id = 2
),

order_table as
(
select
        order_date,
        order_info.sale_id,
        'Open' as trang_thai,
        affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email,

        string_agg(CAST(lead_id AS STRING)) as lead_ids,
        string_agg(invoice_code) as invoices,      



       SUM(
            if(payment_content in (3,4), 1,0)
        ) as num_order_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,


        SUM(
            if(payment_content in (3,4), round((coalesce(total,0) + coalesce(total_video_course,0) - coalesce(discount_money,0))*currency_exchange_rate),0)
        ) as rev_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,


from order_info
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = order_info.sale_id

where order_date >= '2024-01-01'
  -- and order_date >= '2025-01-20'
  group by order_date,sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email
  order by order_date desc
),


result as (
select
      coalesce(ot.order_date, lt.lead_date) as cal_date,
      coalesce(ot.sale_id,lt.sale_id) as sale_id,
      coalesce(ot.trang_thai, lt.trang_thai) as trang_thai,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_campaign, lt.affiliate_campaign) as affiliate_campaign,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_category,lt.affiliate_category) as affiliate_category,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_email, lt.affiliate_email) as affiliate_email,  

      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads,0)) as num_leads,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_lien_he,0)) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,0)) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,
 
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi,

      -- SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_booked,0)) as num_test_booked,
      -- SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_completed,0)) as num_test_completed,

      -- SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_hoc_thu,0)) as num_order_hoc_thu,
      SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,0)) as num_order_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,      
      SUM(coalesce(ot.rev_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,0)) as rev_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,   
      


       
from lead_table lt
full join order_table ot on (ot.order_date = lt.lead_date and lt.sale_id = ot.sale_id and lt.affiliate_campaign=ot.affiliate_campaign and lt.affiliate_category=ot.affiliate_category and lt.affiliate_email=ot.affiliate_email and lt.trang_thai=ot.trang_thai)
group by cal_date, sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email 
order by cal_date desc, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email
)

select r.*,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = r.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
from result r
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = r.sale_id
;
