from order_info
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = order_info.sale_id

where order_date >= '2024-01-01'
  -- and order_date >= '2025-01-20'
  group by order_date,sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email
  order by order_date desc
),


result as (
select
      coalesce(ot.order_date, lt.lead_date) as cal_date,
      coalesce(ot.sale_id,lt.sale_id) as sale_id,
      coalesce(ot.trang_thai, lt.trang_thai) as trang_thai,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_campaign, lt.affiliate_campaign) as affiliate_campaign,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_category,lt.affiliate_category) as affiliate_category,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_email, lt.affiliate_email) as affiliate_email,  

      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads,0)) as num_leads,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_lien_he,0)) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,0)) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,
 
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi,

      -- SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_booked,0)) as num_test_booked,
      -- SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_completed,0)) as num_test_completed,

      -- SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_hoc_thu,0)) as num_order_hoc_thu,
      SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,0)) as num_order_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,      
      SUM(coalesce(ot.rev_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,0)) as rev_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,   
      


       
from lead_table lt
full join order_table ot on (ot.order_date = lt.lead_date and lt.sale_id = ot.sale_id and lt.affiliate_campaign=ot.affiliate_campaign and lt.affiliate_category=ot.affiliate_category and lt.affiliate_email=ot.affiliate_email and lt.trang_thai=ot.trang_thai)
group by cal_date, sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email 
order by cal_date desc, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email
)

select r.*,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = r.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
from result r
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = r.sale_id
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.ceo_ghi_danh_lai_THAI_view_temp`
AS with general_table as (
SELECT
  -- CAST(FORMAT_TIMESTAMP("%d/%m/%Y", (bl.created_at)) AS STRING) AS register_created
    bl.id
  , bl.status
  , bl.utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign
  , bl.reason_cancel_id
  , bl.created_at
  , bo.invoice_code
  , bo.payment_content
  , bo.total
  , bo.payment_status
  , bo.status as booking_order_status
  , bo.discount_money
  , bo.currency_exchange_rate
  , date(bo.created_at) as order_date
 
  , `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_lead_status`(bl.status) as lead_status
  , (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as affiliate_category
  , (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and u.id = au.user_id ) as affiliate_email
  , (SELECT max(p.name) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p WHERE p.user_id = bl.sale_id) AS sale_follow
    , (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = bl.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email
  -- ngaltt start
    ,(SELECT max(p.name) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p WHERE p.user_id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor
  , (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,

    -- (select date(bsn.begin_at)
    -- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_new` bsn
    -- where bsn.id = bl.booking_test_id) as test_date,

    bl.booking_test_id,
    bl.sale_id,
    -- (select bsn.status_id,
    -- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_new` bsn
    -- where bsn.id = bl.booking_test_id) as booking_test_status

    -- ngaltt start
 `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(bo.payment_content) AS loai_don_hang
, IF(bo.payment_content = 1, 1, 0) as hoc_thu
, IF(bo.payment_content = 2, 1, 0) as ghi_danh_lan_dau
, IF(bo.payment_content = 3, 1, 0) as tra_gop_lan_sau
, IF(bo.payment_content = 4, 1, 0) as ghi_danh_lai
, (CASE WHEN bl.upsell = 1 THEN 'Upsell' ELSE 'Lead' END) AS loai_lead
, (CASE WHEN bl.is_blocked = 0 THEN 'Open'  ELSE 'Blocked' END) AS trang_thai
    -- ngaltt end
, if((select max(u.id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u,
  (select parent_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = bst.user_id and bst.is_user_test != 1) t1
  where u.id = t1.parent_id and u.phone_number = bl.intl_phone_number) is null, 'Chưa là HV', 'Đã là HV') as HV_Yes_No
, case
    when bl.subject_code = 'EK' then 'Tiếng Anh trẻ em'
    when bl.subject_code = 'EA' then 'Tiếng Anh người lớn'
    when bl.subject_code = 'M' then 'Toán'
    when bl.subject_code = 'C' then 'Group Class'
    when bl.subject_code = 'AI' then 'AI Tutor'
    when bl.subject_code = 'AI-PRE' then 'AI Tutor Premium'
  end as subject_code
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bl
-- ngaltt start
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = bl.sale_id
-- ngaltt end
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo ON bl.id = bo.lead_id
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.auth_assignment` aa ON aa.user_id = bl.sale_id
WHERE bl.country_id = 1
-- AND aa.item_name IN('Telesales', 'Lead Telesales','SALE - Manager','SALE - Telesales - Staff','SALE - Telesales Supervisor')
AND bl.Upsell = 1
),

lead_table as
(
select 
        date(created_at) as lead_date, 
        sale_id,
        affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email,
        trang_thai,
        count(distinct id) as num_leads,   

      SUM(
            if(status in (6,12),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      
      SUM(
          if(reason_cancel_id in ('20') and status in (9),1,0)
      ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,

      SUM(
            if(status in (3,4,5),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(
            if(status in (21,22),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(
          if(reason_cancel_id not in ('20') and status in (9),1,0)
      ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(
            if(status in (9),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi
from general_table
where date(created_at) >= '2024-01-01'
  -- and date(created_at) >= '2025-01-20'
  group by lead_date, sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email
  order by lead_date desc
),

order_info as (
select 
        bo.invoice_code,
        bo.created_by as sale_id,
        bo.payment_content,
        bo.total,
        bo.total_video_course,
        bo.payment_status,
        bo.status,
        bo.discount_money,
        bo.currency_exchange_rate,
        date(bo.created_at) as order_date,
        bl.utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign,
        (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as affiliate_category,
         (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
           `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and u.id = au.user_id ) as affiliate_email,
        case
          when bl.subject_code = 'EK' then 'Tiếng Anh trẻ em'
          when bl.subject_code = 'EA' then 'Tiếng Anh người lớn'
          when bl.subject_code = 'M' then 'Toán'
          when bl.subject_code = 'C' then 'Group Class'
          when bl.subject_code = 'AI' then 'AI Tutor'
          when bl.subject_code = 'AI-PRE' then 'AI Tutor Premium'
        end as subject_code,
        bo.lead_id,

from `kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
left join `kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl on bl.id = bo.lead_id
where bo.status in (4) and bo.payment_status in (0,1,3,4)
      and bo.international_country_id = 1
),

order_table as
(
select
        order_date,
        order_info.sale_id,
        'Open' as trang_thai,
        affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email,

        string_agg(CAST(lead_id AS STRING)) as lead_ids,
        string_agg(invoice_code) as invoices,      



       SUM(
            if(payment_content in (3,4), 1,0)
        ) as num_order_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,


        SUM(
            if(payment_content in (3,4), round((coalesce(total,0) + coalesce(total_video_course,0) - coalesce(discount_money,0))*currency_exchange_rate),0)
        ) as rev_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,


from order_info
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = order_info.sale_id

where order_date >= '2024-01-01'
  -- and order_date >= '2025-01-20'
  group by order_date,sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email
  order by order_date desc
),


result as (
select
      coalesce(ot.order_date, lt.lead_date) as cal_date,
      coalesce(ot.sale_id,lt.sale_id) as sale_id,
      coalesce(ot.trang_thai, lt.trang_thai) as trang_thai,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_campaign, lt.affiliate_campaign) as affiliate_campaign,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_category,lt.affiliate_category) as affiliate_category,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_email, lt.affiliate_email) as affiliate_email,  

      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads,0)) as num_leads,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_lien_he,0)) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,0)) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,
 
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi,

      -- SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_booked,0)) as num_test_booked,
      -- SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_completed,0)) as num_test_completed,

      -- SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_hoc_thu,0)) as num_order_hoc_thu,
      SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,0)) as num_order_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,      
      SUM(coalesce(ot.rev_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,0)) as rev_ghi_danh_lai_tra_gop,   
      


       
from lead_table lt
full join order_table ot on (ot.order_date = lt.lead_date and lt.sale_id = ot.sale_id and lt.affiliate_campaign=ot.affiliate_campaign and lt.affiliate_category=ot.affiliate_category and lt.affiliate_email=ot.affiliate_email and lt.trang_thai=ot.trang_thai)
group by cal_date, sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email 
order by cal_date desc, trang_thai, affiliate_campaign, affiliate_category, affiliate_email
)

select r.*,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = r.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
from result r
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = r.sale_id
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.ceo_ghi_danh_lan_dau_INDO_view_temp`
AS with general_table as (
SELECT
    bl.id
  , bl.status
  , bl.actual_utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign
  , bl.reason_cancel_id
  , bl.created_at
  , bo.invoice_code
  , bo.payment_content
  , bo.total
  , bo.payment_status
  , bo.status as booking_order_status
  , bo.discount_money
  , bo.currency_exchange_rate
  , date(bo.created_at) as order_date
 
  , `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_lead_status`(bl.status) as lead_status
  , (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as affiliate_category
  , (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and u.id = au.user_id ) as affiliate_email
  , (SELECT max(p.name) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p WHERE p.user_id = bl.sale_id) AS sale_follow
    , (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = bl.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email
    ,(SELECT max(p.name) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p WHERE p.user_id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor
  , (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
  
    -- (select date(bsn.begin_at)
    -- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_new` bsn
    -- where bsn.id = bl.booking_test_id) as test_date,


    bl.booking_test_id,
    bl.sale_id,

    -- (select bsn.status_id,
    -- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_new` bsn
    -- where bsn.id = bl.booking_test_id) as booking_test_status




  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(bo.payment_content) AS loai_don_hang
, IF(bo.payment_content = 1, 1, 0) as hoc_thu
, IF(bo.payment_content = 2, 1, 0) as ghi_danh_lan_dau
, IF(bo.payment_content = 3, 1, 0) as tra_gop_lan_sau
, IF(bo.payment_content = 4, 1, 0) as ghi_danh_lai
, (CASE WHEN bl.upsell = 1 THEN 'Upsell' ELSE 'Lead' END) AS loai_lead
, (CASE WHEN bl.is_blocked = 0 THEN 'Open'  ELSE 'Blocked' END) AS trang_thai
    -- ngaltt end
, if((select max(u.id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u,
  (select parent_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = bst.user_id and bst.is_user_test != 1) t1
  where u.id = t1.parent_id and u.phone_number = bl.intl_phone_number) is null, 'Chưa là HV', 'Đã là HV') as HV_Yes_No
, case
    when bl.subject_code = 'EK' then 'Tiếng Anh trẻ em'
    when bl.subject_code = 'EA' then 'Tiếng Anh người lớn'
    when bl.subject_code = 'M' then 'Toán'
    when bl.subject_code = 'C' then 'Group Class'
    when bl.subject_code = 'AI' then 'AI Tutor'
    when bl.subject_code = 'AI-PRE' then 'AI Tutor Premium'
  end as subject_code
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bl
-- ngaltt start
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = bl.sale_id
-- ngaltt end
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo ON bl.id = bo.lead_id
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.auth_assignment` aa ON aa.user_id = bl.sale_id
WHERE bl.country_id = 2
-- AND aa.item_name IN('Telesales', 'Lead Telesales','SALE - Manager','SALE - Telesales - Staff','SALE - Telesales Supervisor')
AND bl.Upsell != 1
),

lead_table as
(
select 
        date(created_at) as lead_date, 
        sale_id,
        -- sale_follow_email,
        trang_thai,
        affiliate_category,
        affiliate_email,
        affiliate_campaign,
        subject_code,
        count(distinct id) as num_leads,   

      SUM(
            if(status in (6,12),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      
      SUM(
          if(reason_cancel_id in ('8') and status in (9),1,0)
      ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,

      SUM(
            if(status in (3,4,5),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(
            if(status in (21,22),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(
          if(reason_cancel_id not in ('8') and status in (9),1,0)
      ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(
            if(status in (9),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi
from general_table
where 
      date(created_at) >= '2024-01-01'
      -- date(created_at) >= '2025-01-01'
  -- and date(created_at) <= '2025-01-31'
  group by lead_date, sale_id,trang_thai,affiliate_category,affiliate_email,affiliate_campaign,subject_code
  order by lead_date desc
),

booking_test_data as (
select

      bsn.id as booking_test_id,
      date(bsn.begin_at) as test_date,
      min(bsn.status_id) as booking_test_status,
      min(gt.affiliate_campaign) as affiliate_campaign,
      min(gt.affiliate_email) as affiliate_email,
      min(gt.affiliate_category) as affiliate_category,
      min(bs.sale_in_charge_id) as sale_id,
      -- `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_telesale_email`(min(bs.sale_in_charge_id)) as sale_follow_email,
      -- min(tsm.telesales_id) as sale_sup_id,
      -- min(gt.sale_follow_supervisor_email) as sale_follow_supervisor_email,
      min(gt.trang_thai) as trang_thai,
      min(gt.subject_code) as subject_code,
      min(gt.status) as status,
      

      

from `kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
left join `kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn on bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id
left join `kynaforkids.booking_student` bs on bssn.student_id = bs.user_id
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = bs.sale_in_charge_id

left join general_table gt on bsn.id = gt.booking_test_id
where 
      --date(bsn.begin_at) <= '2025-01-31' and date(bsn.begin_at) >= '2025-01-01'
      bsn.program_id IN (8,13,47,48,53,54,55,56,89,90)
      and bssn.country_id = 2
group by bsn.id, test_date
),

test_table as
(
select 
        test_date, 
        sale_id,
        -- sale_follow_email,
        -- sale_follow_supervisor_email,
        trang_thai,
        affiliate_category, 
        affiliate_email,
        affiliate_campaign,
        subject_code,
        SUM(
            if(booking_test_status in (5), 1,0)
        ) as num_test_completed,

        SUM(
            if(status in (7),1,0)
        ) as num_test_completed_alt,

        SUM(
            if(booking_test_id is not null, 1,0)
        ) as num_test_booked,
from booking_test_data
where 
      test_date >= '2024-01-01'
      -- test_date >= '2025-01-01'
  -- and test_date <= '2025-01-31'
  group by test_date, sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_category, affiliate_email, affiliate_campaign, subject_code
  order by test_date desc
),

order_info as (
select 
         bo.invoice_code,
        --  (select bl.sale_id from `kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl where bl.id = bo.lead_id) as sale_id,
         bo.created_by as sale_id,
         bo.payment_content,
         bo.total,
         bo.total_video_course,
         bo.payment_status,
         bo.status,
         bo.discount_money,
         bo.currency_exchange_rate,
         date(bo.created_at) as order_date,
         bl.actual_utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign,
         (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as affiliate_category,
         (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
           `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and u.id = au.user_id ) as affiliate_email,
        case
          when bl.subject_code = 'EK' then 'Tiếng Anh trẻ em'
          when bl.subject_code = 'EA' then 'Tiếng Anh người lớn'
          when bl.subject_code = 'M' then 'Toán'
          when bl.subject_code = 'C' then 'Group Class'
          when bl.subject_code = 'AI' then 'AI Tutor'
          when bl.subject_code = 'AI-PRE' then 'AI Tutor Premium'
        end as subject_code,
        bo.lead_id,

from `kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
left join `kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl on bl.id = bo.lead_id
where bo.status in (4) and bo.payment_status in (0,1,3,4)
      and bo.international_country_id = 2
),

order_table as
(
select
        order_date,
        order_info.sale_id,
        -- (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = order_info.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email,
        -- (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
        'Open' as trang_thai,
        affiliate_category,
        affiliate_email,
        subject_code,
        affiliate_campaign,
        string_agg(CAST(lead_id AS STRING)) as lead_ids,
        string_agg(invoice_code) as invoices,      

        SUM(
            if(payment_content in (1), 1,0)
        ) as num_order_hoc_thu,


       SUM(
            if(payment_content in (2), 1,0)
        ) as num_order_ghi_danh_lan_dau,


          SUM(
            if(payment_content in (2), round((coalesce(total,0) + coalesce(total_video_course,0) - coalesce(discount_money,0))*currency_exchange_rate),0)
        ) as rev_ghi_danh_lan_dau,


from order_info
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = order_info.sale_id
where order_date >= '2024-01-01'
      -- order_date >= '2025-01-01'
  -- and order_date <= '2025-01-31'
  group by order_date, sale_id, affiliate_category,affiliate_email,affiliate_campaign,subject_code
  order by order_date desc
),


result as (
select
      coalesce(ot.order_date,tt.test_date,lt.lead_date) as cal_date,
      coalesce(ot.sale_id,tt.sale_id,lt.sale_id) as sale_id,
      -- coalesce(ot.sale_follow_email,tt.sale_follow_email,lt.sale_follow_email) as sale_follow_email,
      -- coalesce(ot.sale_follow_supervisor_email,tt.sale_follow_supervisor_email,lt.sale_follow_supervisor_email) as sale_follow_supervisor_email,
      coalesce(ot.trang_thai,tt.trang_thai,lt.trang_thai) as trang_thai,
      
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_category,tt.affiliate_category,lt.affiliate_category) as affiliate_category,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_email,tt.affiliate_email,lt.affiliate_email) as affiliate_email,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_campaign,tt.affiliate_campaign,lt.affiliate_campaign) as affiliate_campaign,
      coalesce(ot.subject_code,tt.subject_code,lt.subject_code) as subject,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads,0)) as num_leads,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_lien_he,0)) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,0)) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,
 
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi,

      SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_booked,0)) as num_test_booked,
      SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_completed,0)) as num_test_completed,

      SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_hoc_thu,0)) as num_order_hoc_thu,
      SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_ghi_danh_lan_dau,0)) as num_order_ghi_danh_lan_dau,      
      SUM(coalesce(ot.rev_ghi_danh_lan_dau,0)) as rev_ghi_danh_lan_dau,   
      


       
from lead_table lt
full join test_table tt on (lt.lead_date = tt.test_date and lt.sale_id = tt.sale_id and lt.trang_thai=tt.trang_thai and lt.affiliate_campaign=tt.affiliate_campaign and lt.affiliate_category=tt.affiliate_category and lt.affiliate_email=tt.affiliate_email and lt.subject_code=tt.subject_code)  
full join order_table ot on (ot.order_date = lt.lead_date and lt.sale_id = ot.sale_id and lt.affiliate_campaign=ot.affiliate_campaign and lt.affiliate_category=ot.affiliate_category and lt.affiliate_email=ot.affiliate_email and lt.subject_code=ot.subject_code and lt.trang_thai=ot.trang_thai)
-- where lt.lead_date = '2025-02-02' or tt.test_date = '2025-02-02' or ot.order_date = '2025-02-02'
group by cal_date, sale_id, trang_thai ,affiliate_category,affiliate_email,affiliate_campaign,subject
order by cal_date desc, trang_thai
)

select r.*,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = r.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
from result r
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = r.sale_id
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.ceo_ghi_danh_lan_dau_LAO_view_temp`
AS with general_table as (
SELECT
    bl.id
  , bl.status
  , bl.actual_utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign
  , bl.reason_cancel_id
  , bl.created_at
  , bo.invoice_code
  , bo.payment_content
  , bo.total
  , bo.payment_status
  , bo.status as booking_order_status
  , bo.discount_money
  , bo.currency_exchange_rate
  , date(bo.created_at) as order_date
 
  , `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_lead_status`(bl.status) as lead_status
  , (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as affiliate_category
  , (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and u.id = au.user_id ) as affiliate_email
  , (SELECT max(p.name) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p WHERE p.user_id = bl.sale_id) AS sale_follow
    , (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = bl.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email
    ,(SELECT max(p.name) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p WHERE p.user_id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor
  , (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
  
    -- (select date(bsn.begin_at)
    -- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_new` bsn
    -- where bsn.id = bl.booking_test_id) as test_date,


    bl.booking_test_id,
    bl.sale_id,

    -- (select bsn.status_id,
    -- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_new` bsn
    -- where bsn.id = bl.booking_test_id) as booking_test_status




  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(bo.payment_content) AS loai_don_hang
, IF(bo.payment_content = 1, 1, 0) as hoc_thu
, IF(bo.payment_content = 2, 1, 0) as ghi_danh_lan_dau
, IF(bo.payment_content = 3, 1, 0) as tra_gop_lan_sau
, IF(bo.payment_content = 4, 1, 0) as ghi_danh_lai
, (CASE WHEN bl.upsell = 1 THEN 'Upsell' ELSE 'Lead' END) AS loai_lead
, (CASE WHEN bl.is_blocked = 0 THEN 'Open'  ELSE 'Blocked' END) AS trang_thai
    -- ngaltt end
, if((select max(u.id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u,
  (select parent_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = bst.user_id and bst.is_user_test != 1) t1
  where u.id = t1.parent_id and u.phone_number = bl.intl_phone_number) is null, 'Chưa là HV', 'Đã là HV') as HV_Yes_No
, case
    when bl.subject_code = 'EK' then 'Tiếng Anh trẻ em'
    when bl.subject_code = 'EA' then 'Tiếng Anh người lớn'
    when bl.subject_code = 'M' then 'Toán'
    when bl.subject_code = 'C' then 'Group Class'
    when bl.subject_code = 'AI' then 'AI Tutor'
    when bl.subject_code = 'AI-PRE' then 'AI Tutor Premium'
  end as subject_code
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bl
-- ngaltt start
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = bl.sale_id
-- ngaltt end
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo ON bl.id = bo.lead_id
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.auth_assignment` aa ON aa.user_id = bl.sale_id
WHERE bl.country_id = 5
-- AND aa.item_name IN('Telesales', 'Lead Telesales','SALE - Manager','SALE - Telesales - Staff','SALE - Telesales Supervisor')
AND bl.Upsell != 1
),

lead_table as
(
select 
        date(created_at) as lead_date, 
        sale_id,
        -- sale_follow_email,
        trang_thai,
        affiliate_category,
        affiliate_email,
        affiliate_campaign,
        subject_code,
        count(distinct id) as num_leads,   

      SUM(
            if(status in (6,12),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      
      SUM(
          if(reason_cancel_id in ('8') and status in (9),1,0)
      ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,

      SUM(
            if(status in (3,4,5),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(
            if(status in (21,22),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(
          if(reason_cancel_id not in ('8') and status in (9),1,0)
      ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(
            if(status in (9),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi
from general_table
where 
      date(created_at) >= '2024-01-01'
      -- date(created_at) >= '2025-01-01'
  -- and date(created_at) <= '2025-01-31'
  group by lead_date, sale_id,trang_thai,affiliate_category,affiliate_email,affiliate_campaign,subject_code
  order by lead_date desc
),

booking_test_data as (
select

      bsn.id as booking_test_id,
      date(bsn.begin_at) as test_date,
      min(bsn.status_id) as booking_test_status,
      min(gt.affiliate_campaign) as affiliate_campaign,
      min(gt.affiliate_email) as affiliate_email,
      min(gt.affiliate_category) as affiliate_category,
      min(bs.sale_in_charge_id) as sale_id,
      -- `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_telesale_email`(min(bs.sale_in_charge_id)) as sale_follow_email,
      -- min(tsm.telesales_id) as sale_sup_id,
      -- min(gt.sale_follow_supervisor_email) as sale_follow_supervisor_email,
      min(gt.trang_thai) as trang_thai,
      min(gt.subject_code) as subject_code,
      min(gt.status) as status,
      

      

from `kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
left join `kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn on bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id
left join `kynaforkids.booking_student` bs on bssn.student_id = bs.user_id
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = bs.sale_in_charge_id

left join general_table gt on bsn.id = gt.booking_test_id
where 
      --date(bsn.begin_at) <= '2025-01-31' and date(bsn.begin_at) >= '2025-01-01'
      bsn.program_id IN (8,13,47,48,53,54,55,56,89,90)
      and bssn.country_id = 5
group by bsn.id, test_date
),

test_table as
(
select 
        test_date, 
        sale_id,
        -- sale_follow_email,
        -- sale_follow_supervisor_email,
        trang_thai,
        affiliate_category, 
        affiliate_email,
        affiliate_campaign,
        subject_code,
        SUM(
            if(booking_test_status in (5), 1,0)
        ) as num_test_completed,

        SUM(
            if(status in (7),1,0)
        ) as num_test_completed_alt,

        SUM(
            if(booking_test_id is not null, 1,0)
        ) as num_test_booked,
from booking_test_data
where 
      test_date >= '2024-01-01'
      -- test_date >= '2025-01-01'
  -- and test_date <= '2025-01-31'
  group by test_date, sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_category, affiliate_email, affiliate_campaign, subject_code
  order by test_date desc
),

order_info as (
select 
         bo.invoice_code,
        --  (select bl.sale_id from `kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl where bl.id = bo.lead_id) as sale_id,
         bo.created_by as sale_id,
         bo.payment_content,
         bo.total,
         bo.total_video_course,
         bo.payment_status,
         bo.status,
         bo.discount_money,
         bo.currency_exchange_rate,
         date(bo.created_at) as order_date,
         bl.actual_utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign,
         (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as affiliate_category,
         (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
           `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and u.id = au.user_id ) as affiliate_email,
        case
          when bl.subject_code = 'EK' then 'Tiếng Anh trẻ em'
          when bl.subject_code = 'EA' then 'Tiếng Anh người lớn'
          when bl.subject_code = 'M' then 'Toán'
          when bl.subject_code = 'C' then 'Group Class'
          when bl.subject_code = 'AI' then 'AI Tutor'
          when bl.subject_code = 'AI-PRE' then 'AI Tutor Premium'
        end as subject_code,
        bo.lead_id,

from `kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
left join `kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl on bl.id = bo.lead_id
where bo.status in (4) and bo.payment_status in (0,1,3,4)
      and bo.international_country_id = 5
),

order_table as
(
select
        order_date,
        order_info.sale_id,
        -- (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = order_info.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email,
        -- (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
        'Open' as trang_thai,
        affiliate_category,
        affiliate_email,
        subject_code,
        affiliate_campaign,
        string_agg(CAST(lead_id AS STRING)) as lead_ids,
        string_agg(invoice_code) as invoices,      

        SUM(
            if(payment_content in (1), 1,0)
        ) as num_order_hoc_thu,


       SUM(
            if(payment_content in (2), 1,0)
        ) as num_order_ghi_danh_lan_dau,


          SUM(
            if(payment_content in (2), round((coalesce(total,0) + coalesce(total_video_course,0) - coalesce(discount_money,0))*currency_exchange_rate),0)
        ) as rev_ghi_danh_lan_dau,


from order_info
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = order_info.sale_id
where order_date >= '2024-01-01'
      -- order_date >= '2025-01-01'
  -- and order_date <= '2025-01-31'
  group by order_date, sale_id, affiliate_category,affiliate_email,affiliate_campaign,subject_code
  order by order_date desc
),


result as (
select
      coalesce(ot.order_date,tt.test_date,lt.lead_date) as cal_date,
      coalesce(ot.sale_id,tt.sale_id,lt.sale_id) as sale_id,
      -- coalesce(ot.sale_follow_email,tt.sale_follow_email,lt.sale_follow_email) as sale_follow_email,
      -- coalesce(ot.sale_follow_supervisor_email,tt.sale_follow_supervisor_email,lt.sale_follow_supervisor_email) as sale_follow_supervisor_email,
      coalesce(ot.trang_thai,tt.trang_thai,lt.trang_thai) as trang_thai,
      
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_category,tt.affiliate_category,lt.affiliate_category) as affiliate_category,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_email,tt.affiliate_email,lt.affiliate_email) as affiliate_email,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_campaign,tt.affiliate_campaign,lt.affiliate_campaign) as affiliate_campaign,
      coalesce(ot.subject_code,tt.subject_code,lt.subject_code) as subject,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads,0)) as num_leads,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_lien_he,0)) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,0)) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,
 
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi,

      SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_booked,0)) as num_test_booked,
      SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_completed,0)) as num_test_completed,

      SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_hoc_thu,0)) as num_order_hoc_thu,
      SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_ghi_danh_lan_dau,0)) as num_order_ghi_danh_lan_dau,      
      SUM(coalesce(ot.rev_ghi_danh_lan_dau,0)) as rev_ghi_danh_lan_dau,   
      


       
from lead_table lt
full join test_table tt on (lt.lead_date = tt.test_date and lt.sale_id = tt.sale_id and lt.trang_thai=tt.trang_thai and lt.affiliate_campaign=tt.affiliate_campaign and lt.affiliate_category=tt.affiliate_category and lt.affiliate_email=tt.affiliate_email and lt.subject_code=tt.subject_code)  
full join order_table ot on (ot.order_date = lt.lead_date and lt.sale_id = ot.sale_id and lt.affiliate_campaign=ot.affiliate_campaign and lt.affiliate_category=ot.affiliate_category and lt.affiliate_email=ot.affiliate_email and lt.subject_code=ot.subject_code and lt.trang_thai=ot.trang_thai)
-- where lt.lead_date = '2025-02-02' or tt.test_date = '2025-02-02' or ot.order_date = '2025-02-02'
group by cal_date, sale_id, trang_thai ,affiliate_category,affiliate_email,affiliate_campaign,subject
order by cal_date desc, trang_thai
)

select r.*,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = r.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
from result r
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = r.sale_id
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.ceo_ghi_danh_lan_dau_THAI_view_temp`
AS with general_table as (
SELECT
    bl.id
  , bl.status
  , bl.actual_utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign
  , bl.reason_cancel_id
  , bl.created_at
  , bo.invoice_code
  , bo.payment_content
  , bo.total
  , bo.payment_status
  , bo.status as booking_order_status
  , bo.discount_money
  , bo.currency_exchange_rate
  , date(bo.created_at) as order_date
 
  , `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_lead_status`(bl.status) as lead_status
  , (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as affiliate_category
  , (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and u.id = au.user_id ) as affiliate_email
  , (SELECT max(p.name) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p WHERE p.user_id = bl.sale_id) AS sale_follow
    , (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = bl.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email
    ,(SELECT max(p.name) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p WHERE p.user_id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor
  , (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
  
    -- (select date(bsn.begin_at)
    -- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_new` bsn
    -- where bsn.id = bl.booking_test_id) as test_date,


    bl.booking_test_id,
    bl.sale_id,

    -- (select bsn.status_id,
    -- from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_new` bsn
    -- where bsn.id = bl.booking_test_id) as booking_test_status




  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_payment_content`(bo.payment_content) AS loai_don_hang
, IF(bo.payment_content = 1, 1, 0) as hoc_thu
, IF(bo.payment_content = 2, 1, 0) as ghi_danh_lan_dau
, IF(bo.payment_content = 3, 1, 0) as tra_gop_lan_sau
, IF(bo.payment_content = 4, 1, 0) as ghi_danh_lai
, (CASE WHEN bl.upsell = 1 THEN 'Upsell' ELSE 'Lead' END) AS loai_lead
, (CASE WHEN bl.is_blocked = 0 THEN 'Open'  ELSE 'Blocked' END) AS trang_thai
    -- ngaltt end
, if((select max(u.id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u,
  (select parent_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = bst.user_id and bst.is_user_test != 1) t1
  where u.id = t1.parent_id and u.phone_number = bl.intl_phone_number) is null, 'Chưa là HV', 'Đã là HV') as HV_Yes_No
, case
    when bl.subject_code = 'EK' then 'Tiếng Anh trẻ em'
    when bl.subject_code = 'EA' then 'Tiếng Anh người lớn'
    when bl.subject_code = 'M' then 'Toán'
    when bl.subject_code = 'C' then 'Group Class'
    when bl.subject_code = 'AI' then 'AI Tutor'
    when bl.subject_code = 'AI-PRE' then 'AI Tutor Premium'
  end as subject_code
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bl
-- ngaltt start
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = bl.sale_id
-- ngaltt end
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo ON bl.id = bo.lead_id
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.auth_assignment` aa ON aa.user_id = bl.sale_id
WHERE bl.country_id = 1
-- AND aa.item_name IN('Telesales', 'Lead Telesales','SALE - Manager','SALE - Telesales - Staff','SALE - Telesales Supervisor')
AND bl.Upsell != 1
),

lead_table as
(
select 
        date(created_at) as lead_date, 
        sale_id,
        -- sale_follow_email,
        trang_thai,
        affiliate_category,
        affiliate_email,
        affiliate_campaign,
        subject_code,
        count(distinct id) as num_leads,   

      SUM(
            if(status in (6,12),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      
      SUM(
          if(reason_cancel_id in ('8') and status in (9),1,0)
      ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,

      SUM(
            if(status in (3,4,5),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(
            if(status in (21,22),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(
          if(reason_cancel_id not in ('8') and status in (9),1,0)
      ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(
            if(status in (9),1,0)
        ) as num_leads_status_tu_choi
from general_table
where 
      date(created_at) >= '2024-01-01'
      -- date(created_at) >= '2025-01-01'
  -- and date(created_at) <= '2025-01-31'
  group by lead_date, sale_id,trang_thai,affiliate_category,affiliate_email,affiliate_campaign,subject_code
  order by lead_date desc
),

booking_test_data as (
select

      bsn.id as booking_test_id,
      date(bsn.begin_at) as test_date,
      min(bsn.status_id) as booking_test_status,
      min(gt.affiliate_campaign) as affiliate_campaign,
      min(gt.affiliate_email) as affiliate_email,
      min(gt.affiliate_category) as affiliate_category,
      min(bs.sale_in_charge_id) as sale_id,
      -- `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_telesale_email`(min(bs.sale_in_charge_id)) as sale_follow_email,
      -- min(tsm.telesales_id) as sale_sup_id,
      -- min(gt.sale_follow_supervisor_email) as sale_follow_supervisor_email,
      min(gt.trang_thai) as trang_thai,
      min(gt.subject_code) as subject_code,
      min(gt.status) as status,
      

      

from `kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
left join `kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn on bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id
left join `kynaforkids.booking_student` bs on bssn.student_id = bs.user_id
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = bs.sale_in_charge_id

left join general_table gt on bsn.id = gt.booking_test_id
where 
      --date(bsn.begin_at) <= '2025-01-31' and date(bsn.begin_at) >= '2025-01-01'
      bsn.program_id IN (8,13,47,48,53,54,55,56,89,90)
      and bssn.country_id = 1
group by bsn.id, test_date
),

test_table as
(
select 
        test_date, 
        sale_id,
        -- sale_follow_email,
        -- sale_follow_supervisor_email,
        trang_thai,
        affiliate_category, 
        affiliate_email,
        affiliate_campaign,
        subject_code,
        SUM(
            if(booking_test_status in (5), 1,0)
        ) as num_test_completed,

        SUM(
            if(status in (7),1,0)
        ) as num_test_completed_alt,

        SUM(
            if(booking_test_id is not null, 1,0)
        ) as num_test_booked,
from booking_test_data
where 
      test_date >= '2024-01-01'
      -- test_date >= '2025-01-01'
  -- and test_date <= '2025-01-31'
  group by test_date, sale_id, trang_thai, affiliate_category, affiliate_email, affiliate_campaign, subject_code
  order by test_date desc
),

order_info as (
select 
         bo.invoice_code,
        --  (select bl.sale_id from `kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl where bl.id = bo.lead_id) as sale_id,
         bo.created_by as sale_id,
         bo.payment_content,
         bo.total,
         bo.total_video_course,
         bo.payment_status,
         bo.status,
         bo.discount_money,
         bo.currency_exchange_rate,
         date(bo.created_at) as order_date,
         bl.actual_utm_campaign as affiliate_campaign,
         (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac,
          `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id) as affiliate_category,
         (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au,
           `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where au.affiliate_id = bl.affiliate_id and u.id = au.user_id ) as affiliate_email,
        case
          when bl.subject_code = 'EK' then 'Tiếng Anh trẻ em'
          when bl.subject_code = 'EA' then 'Tiếng Anh người lớn'
          when bl.subject_code = 'M' then 'Toán'
          when bl.subject_code = 'C' then 'Group Class'
          when bl.subject_code = 'AI' then 'AI Tutor'
          when bl.subject_code = 'AI-PRE' then 'AI Tutor Premium'
        end as subject_code,
        bo.lead_id,

from `kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo
left join `kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl on bl.id = bo.lead_id
where bo.status in (4) and bo.payment_status in (0,1,3,4)
      and bo.international_country_id = 1
),

order_table as
(
select
        order_date,
        order_info.sale_id,
        -- (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = order_info.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email,
        -- (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
        'Open' as trang_thai,
        affiliate_category,
        affiliate_email,
        subject_code,
        affiliate_campaign,
        string_agg(CAST(lead_id AS STRING)) as lead_ids,
        string_agg(invoice_code) as invoices,      

        SUM(
            if(payment_content in (1), 1,0)
        ) as num_order_hoc_thu,


       SUM(
            if(payment_content in (2), 1,0)
        ) as num_order_ghi_danh_lan_dau,


          SUM(
            if(payment_content in (2), round((coalesce(total,0) + coalesce(total_video_course,0) - coalesce(discount_money,0))*currency_exchange_rate),0)
        ) as rev_ghi_danh_lan_dau,


from order_info
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = order_info.sale_id
where order_date >= '2024-01-01'
      -- order_date >= '2025-01-01'
  -- and order_date <= '2025-01-31'
  group by order_date, sale_id, affiliate_category,affiliate_email,affiliate_campaign,subject_code
  order by order_date desc
),


result as (
select
      coalesce(ot.order_date,tt.test_date,lt.lead_date) as cal_date,
      coalesce(ot.sale_id,tt.sale_id,lt.sale_id) as sale_id,
      -- coalesce(ot.sale_follow_email,tt.sale_follow_email,lt.sale_follow_email) as sale_follow_email,
      -- coalesce(ot.sale_follow_supervisor_email,tt.sale_follow_supervisor_email,lt.sale_follow_supervisor_email) as sale_follow_supervisor_email,
      coalesce(ot.trang_thai,tt.trang_thai,lt.trang_thai) as trang_thai,
      
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_category,tt.affiliate_category,lt.affiliate_category) as affiliate_category,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_email,tt.affiliate_email,lt.affiliate_email) as affiliate_email,
      coalesce(ot.affiliate_campaign,tt.affiliate_campaign,lt.affiliate_campaign) as affiliate_campaign,
      coalesce(ot.subject_code,tt.subject_code,lt.subject_code) as subject,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads,0)) as num_leads,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_lien_he,0)) as num_leads_status_lien_he,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,0)) as num_leads_status_coc_hen_tt,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_vi_ly_do_trung,
 
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi_loai_ly_do_trung,
      SUM(coalesce(lt.num_leads_status_tu_choi,0)) as num_leads_status_tu_choi,

      SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_booked,0)) as num_test_booked,
      SUM(coalesce(tt.num_test_completed,0)) as num_test_completed,

      SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_hoc_thu,0)) as num_order_hoc_thu,
      SUM(coalesce(ot.num_order_ghi_danh_lan_dau,0)) as num_order_ghi_danh_lan_dau,      
      SUM(coalesce(ot.rev_ghi_danh_lan_dau,0)) as rev_ghi_danh_lan_dau,   
      


       
from lead_table lt
full join test_table tt on (lt.lead_date = tt.test_date and lt.sale_id = tt.sale_id and lt.trang_thai=tt.trang_thai and lt.affiliate_campaign=tt.affiliate_campaign and lt.affiliate_category=tt.affiliate_category and lt.affiliate_email=tt.affiliate_email and lt.subject_code=tt.subject_code)  
full join order_table ot on (ot.order_date = lt.lead_date and lt.sale_id = ot.sale_id and lt.affiliate_campaign=ot.affiliate_campaign and lt.affiliate_category=ot.affiliate_category and lt.affiliate_email=ot.affiliate_email and lt.subject_code=ot.subject_code and lt.trang_thai=ot.trang_thai)
-- where lt.lead_date = '2025-02-02' or tt.test_date = '2025-02-02' or ot.order_date = '2025-02-02'
group by cal_date, sale_id, trang_thai ,affiliate_category,affiliate_email,affiliate_campaign,subject
order by cal_date desc, trang_thai
)

select r.*,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = r.sale_id) AS sale_follow_email,
      (SELECT max(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u WHERE u.id = tsm.telesales_supervisor_id) AS sale_follow_supervisor_email,
from result r
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.telesales_supervisor_mgr` tsm on tsm.telesales_id = r.sale_id
;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.chat_luong_mkt_cb09a9e7-3575-474f-b88e-6fb58512f931`

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.chat_luong_mkt_vn_cb09a9e7-3575-474f-b88e-6fb58512f931_9k956ks9sd`
(
  cal_date DATE,
  sale_id INT64,
  trang_thai STRING,
  affiliate_campaign STRING,
  affiliate_category STRING,
  affiliate_email STRING,
  num_leads INT64,
  num_leads_status_lien_he INT64,
  num_leads_status_tu_van_tham_gia_onl_off INT64,

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.danhthuphanbo_booking_2022_10_01`
AS select 
  date(t1.booking_time) as begin_at,
  t1.program_id,
  t1.student_id as user_id,
  t1.student_code,
  t1.student_name,
  t1.country,
  (select max(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = t1.parent_id) as email,
  t1.program,
  t1.status_id,
  t1.cancel_config_id,
  if((t1.revenue) is null,0,(t1.revenue * if(t1.currency_exchange_rate is null, 1, t1.currency_exchange_rate))) as revenue,
  if(t1.revenue is null,0,t1.revenue) as revenue_nguyen_te
from (
SELECT 
  bs.id as booking_id,
  bs.begin_at as booking_time,
  bss.student_id,
  (select booking_student.student_code from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` booking_student
   where bs.id = bss.booking_session_id and booking_student.user_id = bss.student_id) as student_code,
  case
    when bss.country_id = 1 then 'Thailand'
    when bss.country_id = 2 then 'Indo'
    when bss.country_id = 3 then 'Việt Nam'
    when bss.country_id = 4 then 'Khác'
  end as country,
  case 
  when status_id = 1 then 'Draft'
  when status_id = 2 then 'New'
  when status_id = 3 then 'WaitingApprove'
  when status_id = 4 then 'Approved'
  when status_id = 5 then 'Completed'
  when status_id = 6 then 'Rejected'
  when status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id = 1 then 'Cancelled_by_teacher'
  when status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id = 2 then 'Cancelled_by_student_without_compensate'
  when status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id = 3 then 'Cancelled_by_kyna'
  when status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id = 4 then 'Cancelled_by_student_has_compensate'
  when status_id = 8 then 'Deleted'
  end as booking_status,
  bss.revenue ,
  case
			when bs.program_id = 1 then 'Kyna English VIP'
			when bs.program_id = 2 then 'Kyna English SPEAK'
			when bs.program_id = 3 then 'Chương trình Demo'
			when bs.program_id = 4 then 'Kyna English Tutorials'
			when bs.program_id = 5 then 'Kyna English Class'
      when bs.program_id = 6 then 'Kyna English Junior'
      when bs.program_id = 7 then 'Kyna English Primary'
      when bs.program_id = 8 then 'Chương trình Test Online'
      when bs.program_id = 9 then 'Kyna English SPEAK JUNIOR'
      when bs.program_id = 10 then 'Kyna English IELTS'
      when bs.program_id = 11 then 'Kyna English Business'
      when bs.program_id = 12 then 'Toán Tiểu Học'
      when bs.program_id = 13 then 'Test Online (2 shifts)'
      when bs.program_id = 14 then 'Kyna English Class Vip'
      when bs.program_id = 15 then 'Kyna English Class Speak'
      when bs.program_id = 16 then 'Kyna English Secondary'
      when bs.program_id = 17 then 'Kyna English VIP 45MINS'
      when bs.program_id = 18 then 'Kyna English SPEAK 45MINS'
      when bs.program_id = 19 then 'Kyna English Tutorials 45MINS'
      when bs.program_id = 20 then 'Toán Tiểu Học (Mẫu giáo - Lớp 1 - Lớp 2)'
      when bs.program_id = 21 then 'KE Public Speaking I'
      when bs.program_id = 22 then 'KE Public Speaking II'
	end as program,
  bs.program_id,
  bs.status_id,
  bs.cancel_config_id,
	bss.currency_exchange_rate,
  (select max(p.name) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = bss.student_id) as student_name,
  (select max(u.parent_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = bss.student_id) as parent_id
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs
inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on bs.id = bss.booking_session_id 
where (bs.is_compensatory_course = 0 or bs.is_compensatory_course is null)) t1;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.doanhthu_order_2022_10_01`
AS Select 
    date(bo.accounting_date) as accounting_date,
    (select bsp.user_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp where bo.student_code = bst.student_code and bst.user_id = bsp.user_id and bsp.program_id = bo.program_id) as user_id,
		bo.student_code as ma_hoc_vien,
		(select max(p.`name`) 
		  from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile`  p , `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student`  bst
            where bst.student_code = bo.student_code 
            and p.user_id = bst.user_id) 
		as student_name,
		max(bo.email) as email,
    max(bo.phone_number) as phone_number,
    case
      when max(bo.international_country_id) = 1 then 'Thailand'
      when max(bo.international_country_id) = 2 then 'Indo'
      when max(bo.international_country_id) = 3 then 'Việt Nam'
      when max(bo.international_country_id) = 4 then 'Khác'
    end as country,
    -- ngaltt start
    max(bo.currency_code) as currency_code,
    max(bo.contract_code) as contract_code,
    -- ngaltt end
    max(bo.currency_exchange_rate) as currency_exchange_rate,
    sum((bo.total * bo.currency_exchange_rate) + (bo.total_video_course * bo.currency_exchange_rate)) - sum(if(bo.discount_money is null, 0, (bo.discount_money * bo.currency_exchange_rate))) 
    as tong_thu_has_video_course,
    sum(bo.total * bo.currency_exchange_rate) - sum(if(bo.discount_money is null, 0, (bo.discount_money * bo.currency_exchange_rate))) 
    as tong_thu,
    sum(bo.total) - sum(if(bo.discount_money is null, 0, bo.discount_money)) as tong_thu_nguyen_te,
    bo.program_id,
  case
			when bo.program_id = 1 then 'Kyna English VIP'
			when bo.program_id = 2 then 'Kyna English SPEAK'
			when bo.program_id = 3 then 'Chương trình Demo'
			when bo.program_id = 4 then 'Kyna English Tutorials'
			when bo.program_id = 5 then 'Kyna English Class'
      when bo.program_id = 6 then 'Kyna English Junior'
      when bo.program_id = 7 then 'Kyna English Primary'
      when bo.program_id = 8 then 'Chương trình Test Online'
      when bo.program_id = 9 then 'Kyna English SPEAK JUNIOR'
      when bo.program_id = 10 then 'Kyna English IELTS'
      when bo.program_id = 11 then 'Kyna English Business'
      when bo.program_id = 12 then 'Toán Tiểu Học'
      when bo.program_id = 13 then 'Test Online (2 shifts)'
      when bo.program_id = 14 then 'Kyna English Class Vip'
      when bo.program_id = 15 then 'Kyna English Class Speak'
      when bo.program_id = 16 then 'Kyna English Secondary'
      when bo.program_id = 17 then 'Kyna English VIP 45MINS'
      when bo.program_id = 18 then 'Kyna English SPEAK 45MINS'
      when bo.program_id = 19 then 'Kyna English Tutorials 45MINS'
      when bo.program_id = 20 then 'Toán Tiểu Học (Mẫu giáo - Lớp 1 - Lớp 2)'
      when bo.program_id = 21 then 'KE Public Speaking I'
      when bo.program_id = 22 then 'KE Public Speaking II'
	end as program,
  '' as invoice_code
from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view`  bo
where bo.payment_status = 1 
	and bo.student_code is not null 
group by bo.student_code, bo.program_id, date(bo.accounting_date)

union all 

Select 
  date(bo.accounting_date) as accounting_date,
  0 as user_id,
	'' as ma_hoc_vien,   
  '' as student_name,
	bo.email as email,
  max(bo.phone_number) as phone_number,
  case
      when max(bo.international_country_id) = 1 then 'Thailand'
      when max(bo.international_country_id) = 2 then 'Indo'
      when max(bo.international_country_id) = 3 then 'Việt Nam'
      when max(bo.international_country_id) = 4 then 'Khác'
  end as country,
  -- ngaltt start
  max(bo.currency_code) as currency_code,
  max(bo.contract_code) as contract_code,
  -- ngaltt end
  max(bo.currency_exchange_rate) as currency_exchange_rate,
  sum((bo.total * bo.currency_exchange_rate) + (bo.total_video_course * bo.currency_exchange_rate)) - 
    sum(if(bo.discount_money is null, 0, (bo.discount_money * bo.currency_exchange_rate))) as tong_thu_has_video_course,
  sum(bo.total * bo.currency_exchange_rate) - sum(if(bo.discount_money is null, 0, (bo.discount_money * bo.currency_exchange_rate))) 
  as tong_thu,
  sum(bo.total) - sum(if(bo.discount_money is null, 0, bo.discount_money)) as tong_thu_nguyen_te,
  bo.program_id,
  case
			when bo.program_id = 1 then 'Kyna English VIP'
			when bo.program_id = 2 then 'Kyna English SPEAK'
			when bo.program_id = 3 then 'Chương trình Demo'
			when bo.program_id = 4 then 'Kyna English Tutorials'
			when bo.program_id = 5 then 'Kyna English Class'
      when bo.program_id = 6 then 'Kyna English Junior'
      when bo.program_id = 7 then 'Kyna English Primary'
      when bo.program_id = 8 then 'Chương trình Test Online'
      when bo.program_id = 9 then 'Kyna English SPEAK JUNIOR'
      when bo.program_id = 10 then 'Kyna English IELTS'
      when bo.program_id = 11 then 'Kyna English Business'
      when bo.program_id = 12 then 'Toán Tiểu Học'
      when bo.program_id = 13 then 'Test Online (2 shifts)'
      when bo.program_id = 14 then 'Kyna English Class Vip'
      when bo.program_id = 15 then 'Kyna English Class Speak'
      when bo.program_id = 16 then 'Kyna English Secondary'
      when bo.program_id = 17 then 'Kyna English VIP 45MINS'
      when bo.program_id = 18 then 'Kyna English SPEAK 45MINS'
      when bo.program_id = 19 then 'Kyna English Tutorials 45MINS'
      when bo.program_id = 20 then 'Toán Tiểu Học (Mẫu giáo - Lớp 1 - Lớp 2)'
      when bo.program_id = 21 then 'KE Public Speaking I'
      when bo.program_id = 22 then 'KE Public Speaking II'
	end as program,
  string_agg(bo.invoice_code) as invoice_code
from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view`  bo
where bo.payment_status = 1 
  and bo.student_code is null 
group by bo.email, bo.program_id, date(bo.accounting_date)  ;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.gigabyte_billed_big_query_view`
AS with billed_query as
(
SELECT
  user_email,
  job_id,
  date(creation_time) AS date_billed,
  -- total_bytes_processed / POW(1024, 3) AS gb_processed,
  total_bytes_billed / POW(1024, 4) AS tb_billed,
  -- total_slot_ms / 1000 / 60 AS slot_minutes,
  -- query
FROM
  region-asia-east1.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.JOBS_BY_PROJECT
WHERE
  creation_time >= '2025-06-01' --TIMESTAMP_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
  AND job_type = 'QUERY'
  AND state = 'DONE'
ORDER BY
  tb_billed DESC
)

select 
    -- user_email,
    date_billed,
    sum(tb_billed) as tb_billed
from billed_query
-- group by user_email, date_billed 
group by date_billed
order by date_billed desc;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.gv_Toan_first_booking_date_view`
AS select
      teacher_id,
      teacher_name,
      acceptance_or_reactivated_date as acceptance_date,
      training_status,
      teaching_training_date,
      test_training_date,
      final_contract_completion_date,
      final_qualified_to_teach_date,
      first_booking_date,
      (
       select 
             min(bs.id) as booking_id
       from `kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs 
       where date(bs.begin_at) = first_booking_date 
             and bs.teacher_id = t.teacher_id
             and bs.status_id in (4,5)
      ) as booking_id
       

from `datateam_kynaforkids.report_bien_dong_GV_Toan_efbf2d67-49f4-40cb-b109-2c5c237aeef3_1dxy898vpd` t
where is_math_teacher_or_tester = 1
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.kbc_map_thang9_view`
AS -- Student ID
-- Student Code
-- Loại học viên (Trẻ em/Người lớn)
-- Số buổi đã hoàn thành
-- Số buổi còn lại
-- Số bookings tháng 9/2025
-- Số bookings đã map với KBC tháng 8/2025
-- Số booking thật sự bị cancel bởi KBC tháng 8/2025
-- Số bookings trước giờ từng map với KBC
-- Số booking thật sự bị cancel bởi KBC trước giờ

with

target_students AS (
SELECT 
       bs.user_id as student_id, 
       bs.student_code, 
       bs.user_type_id,
      --  bsp.program_id,
       count(distinct bsn.id) as num_completed_bookings, 
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn
        ON (bs.user_id = bssn.student_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp
        ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
        ON (bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id and bsp.program_id = bsn.program_id)

WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0
      and bs.country_id = 3
      and bsp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.program_type in (2))
      and bsp.program_id not in (3,106,107,108,109,110,111,112)
      AND bsn.status_id in (4,5)
      And bsn.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.program_type in (2))
      and bsn.program_id not in (3,106,107,108,109,110,111,112)
      AND cast(bsn.begin_at as datetime) < current_datetime("UTC+7")     
      --AND (date(bsn.begin_at) >= '2024-10-01' AND date(bsn.begin_at) <= '2024-10-31') 
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bs.user_type_id --, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính tổng số lesson còn lại của học sinh ở các chương trình mà học sinh đang học với các ràng buộc như trên 
remaining_bookings_program AS (
SELECT bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id,
       max(coalesce(bsp.remain_lesson,0)) as bookings_program_remain
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0 
      AND bsp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id in (3,88,106,107,108,109,110,111,112) or bp.type in (2,3,4))
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính số booking đã được chạy ở các trạng thái draft, new, waiting approve, approved (lấy ở ngày hiện tại trở đi)
remaining_bookings_booked AS (
SELECT 
      bs.user_id, 
      bs.student_code, 
      bsp.program_id, 
      count(distinct bsn.id) as bookings_booked
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn
        ON (bs.user_id = bssn.student_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
        ON (bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id and bsp.program_id = bsn.program_id)
WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0 
      AND bsn.status_id in (1,2,3,4)
      AND bsn.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id in (3,88,106,107,108,109,110,111,112) or bp.type in (2,3,4))
      AND cast(bsn.begin_at as datetime) > current_datetime("UTC+7")
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính tổng số booking còn lại của học viên (lấy 2 số trên cộng lại với nhau)
remaining_bookings AS (
SELECT rbp.user_id, --rbp.program_id,-- rbp.program_name, 
      --  max(rbp.bookings_program_remain) + max(coalesce(rbb.bookings_booked,0)) as total_remaining_lessons,
       sum(rbp.bookings_program_remain) + sum(coalesce(rbb.bookings_booked,0)) as total_remaining_lessons,

       --`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_student_name_from_profile_by_student_id`(rbp.user_id) as student_name 
FROM remaining_bookings_program rbp
LEFT JOIN remaining_bookings_booked rbb ON(rbp.user_id = rbb.user_id AND rbp.program_id = rbb.program_id)
WHERE rbp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id in (3,88,106,107,108,109,110,111,112) or bp.type in (2,3,4))
GROUP BY rbp.user_id--, rbp.program_id
),


result_booking_economy as(
select 
      r.first_booking_id,
      r.secondary_booking_id

from `datateam_kynaforkids.hieu_qua_ghep_lop_economy_0f2ad318-1e72-496a-9a5b-d7ecf36b7c11` r
where date(ngay_hoc) >= current_date() 
      and r.economy_status = "Ghép được"
),

bookings_matched_temp as
(
  select 
        distinct r.first_booking_id as booking_id
  from result_booking_economy r

  union all

  select 
        distinct r.secondary_booking_id as booking_id
  from result_booking_economy r
),

matched_bookings as
(
select distinct booking_id from bookings_matched_temp
where booking_id is not null
),

student_sep_2025_bookings as 
(
select
      bss.student_id,
      -- bs.program_id,
      count(distinct bs.id) as num_sep_bookings,
      -- countif(bs.status_id = 1) as num_draft_bookings,
      -- countif(bs.status_id != 1) as num_new_waiting_approved_bookings,
      -- string_agg(`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_status`(bs.status_id, bs.cancel_config_id),", ") as august_bookings_status,

      (select bst.student_code from `kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bst.user_id =bss.student_id) as student_code,

from `kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs
left join `kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on bs.id = bss.booking_session_id
where format_datetime("%Y-%m",bs.begin_at) = '2025-09' and date(bs.begin_at) > current_date()
      and bs.status_id in (1,2,3,4)
      and bs.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id in (3,88,106,107,108,109,110,111,112) or bp.type in (2,3,4))
      and bss.country_id = 3
      and (select bst.student_code from `kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bst.user_id =bss.student_id) like "K%"
      and bs.id not in (select distinct booking_id from matched_bookings)
group by bss.student_id--, program_id 
order by num_sep_bookings desc     
),

bookings_kbc_all as
(
select 
      bs.id as booking_id,
      bst.student_code,
      bst.user_type_id,
      bs.program_id,
      bst.user_id as student_id,
      bs.teacher_id as kbc_teacher_id,
      bs.cancel_config_id,
      format_datetime("%Y-%m",bs.begin_at) as year_month,
from `kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs
left join `kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on bss.booking_session_id = bs.id
left join `kynaforkids.booking_student` bst on bst.user_id = bss.student_id
where --bs.cancel_config_id = 1 --or bs.cancel_config_id = 3 or bs.cancel_config_id = 10
      bs.teacher_id = 1946838
),

kbc_summary as
(
select
      bkbc.student_id,
      count(distinct bkbc.booking_id) as num_map_kbc_bookings,
      countif(bkbc.cancel_config_id = 1) as num_cancel_by_kbc_teacher_bookings,
from bookings_kbc_all bkbc
group by student_id
),

august_kbc_summary as
(
select
      bkbc.student_id,
      count(distinct bkbc.booking_id) as num_map_kbc_bookings,
      countif(bkbc.cancel_config_id = 1) as num_cancel_by_kbc_teacher_bookings,
      
from bookings_kbc_all bkbc
where year_month = '2025-08'
group by student_id
)

select 
      ts.* except(user_type_id),
      case when ts.user_type_id = 1 then 'Trẻ em'
           when ts.user_type_id = 2 then 'Người lớn'
           else "Chưa biết"
      end as student_type,
      rb.total_remaining_lessons,
      stsep.num_sep_bookings as num_sep_05_30_bookings, 
      coalesce(auks.num_map_kbc_bookings,0) as num_august_map_kbc_bookings,
      coalesce(auks.num_cancel_by_kbc_teacher_bookings,0) as num_august_cancel_by_kbc_teacher_bookings,
      coalesce(ks.num_map_kbc_bookings,0) as num_map_kbc_bookings,
      coalesce(ks.num_cancel_by_kbc_teacher_bookings,0) as num_cancel_by_kbc_teacher_bookings,
from student_sep_2025_bookings stsep 
left join remaining_bookings rb on rb.user_id = stsep.student_id
left join target_students ts on ts.student_id = stsep.student_id
left join kbc_summary ks on ks.student_id = stsep.student_id
left join august_kbc_summary auks on auks.student_id = stsep.student_id
where stsep.num_sep_bookings > 0 
      and ts.num_completed_bookings > 0
      and rb.total_remaining_lessons > 0;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.kyna_vn_location_refined`
AS with 

short_god_huyen as 
(
select 
      god.province_id,
      god.province_name,
      god.name,
      case when god.name like "Thành phố%" then trim(right(god.name,length(god.name)-10))
           when god.name like "Quận%" then trim(right(god.name,length(god.name)-5))
           when god.name like "Huyện%" then trim(right(god.name,length(god.name)-6))
           when god.name like "Thị trấn%" then trim(right(god.name,length(god.name)-9))
           when god.name like "Thị xã%" then trim(right(god.name,length(god.name)-7))
           else god.name
      end as god_short_name
from `kynaforkids.gso_district` god
),

huyen_tinh as
(
SELECT 
      god.god_short_name as district_name, 
      max(gop.name) as province_name,
      
FROM short_god_huyen god
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.gso_province` gop on gop.gso_id = god.province_id
group by district_name
)

-- select * from huyen_tinh

select 
      kl.* except (parent_id,position,status,is_deleted,created_time,updated_time,type),
      -- ht.district_name,
      -- ht.province_name,
      case when ht.province_name like "Thành phố%" then trim(right(ht.province_name,length(ht.province_name)-10))
           when ht.province_name like "Tỉnh%" then trim(right(ht.province_name,length(ht.province_name)-5))
           else ht.province_name
      end as province_refined
from `datateam_kynaforkids.kyna_vn_location` kl
left join huyen_tinh ht on lower(ht.district_name) = lower(kl.name)
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.kynaforkids_dataset_table_info_view`
