CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.mkt_standalone_order_ai_new_students_view`
AS with 
order_ai_tutor_single AS
(SELECT 
        (select min(timestamp_seconds(order_action.created_at)) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_action` order_action 
  where order_action.order_id = ord.id and not order_action.order_status = 1 ) as ngay_sale_len_don,
        ord.id,
        ord.completed_at,
        ord.created_by,
        ord.telesale_id,
        ord.register_source,        
        ord.country_id,
        ord.currency_code,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(ord.country_id) as country,

        round(coalesce(ord.currency_exchange_rate,0),2) as currency_exchange_rate,
      --   ord.total as total_oc,

        -- ord.sub_total,
        case when ord.currency_code in ('VND','IDR','KIP') then round(ord.sub_total)
             when ord.currency_code in ('THB','USD','MYR') then round(ord.sub_total,2)
        end as sub_total,

        -- ordd.unit_price,
        case when ord.currency_code in ('VND','IDR','KIP') then round(ordd.unit_price)
             when ord.currency_code in ('THB','USD','MYR') then round(ordd.unit_price,2)
        end as unit_price,

        ori.name as student_name,
        ori.phone_number as student_phone,
        ori.email as student_email,
        ord.invoice_code,
        case
            when ord.`status` = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
            when ord.`status` = 2 then 'Xác nhận'
            when ord.`status` = 3 then 'Hoàn thành'
            when ord.`status` = 4 then 'Hủy'
            else 'Khác'
	      end as status,
        ord.payment_method_id,
        ord.payment_method_status as payment_status_id,
        
        case when ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%' then ori.lead_id
             when ord.invoice_code like 'GRAI%' then bo.lead_id 
            --  (select bo.affiliate_id from `kynaforkids.booking_order` bo where RIGHT(bo.invoice_code,8) = RIGHT(ord.invoice_code,8))
        end as lead_id,
        
        case when ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%' then ord.affiliate_id
             when ord.invoice_code like 'GRAI%' then bo.affiliate_id
        end as affiliate_id,
      --   ord.utm_campaign,
        ordd.package_id,
        ordd.package_subscription_id,
        pk.name as Mon_hoc,
        (select pm.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_method` pm where pm.id = ord.payment_method_id) as payment_method,
        case
      when ord.payment_method_status = 1 then 'Chờ thanh toán'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 2 then 'Đã thanh toán'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 3 then 'Thanh toán thất bại'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 4 then 'Chờ giao hàng'
 	when ord.payment_method_status = 5 then 'Đang giao hàng'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 6 then 'Đã giao hàng'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 7 then 'Đang trả hàng'
      when ord.payment_method_status = 8 then 'Đã trả hàng'
      else null
	end as payment_status,
      -- (select pg.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_gateway` pg where pg.id = ord.shipping_method_id) as shipping_company,
--     (select max(pt.transaction_code) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_transaction` pt where pt.order_id = ord.id) as partner_code,

    -- if(ord.discount_amount is null,0,ord.discount_amount) as discount_amount,
    case when ord.currency_code in ('VND','IDR','KIP') then round(if(ord.discount_amount is null,0,ord.discount_amount))
             when ord.currency_code in ('THB','USD','MYR') then round(if(ord.discount_amount is null,0,ord.discount_amount),2)
    end as discount_amount,

    -- if(ordd.voucher_discount_amount is null,0,ordd.voucher_discount_amount) as voucher_discount_amount,
    case when ord.currency_code in ('VND','IDR','KIP') then round(if(ordd.voucher_discount_amount is null,0,ordd.voucher_discount_amount))
             when ord.currency_code in ('THB','USD','MYR') then round(if(ordd.voucher_discount_amount is null,0,ordd.voucher_discount_amount),2)
    end as voucher_discount_amount,

    -- if(ord.shipping_fee is null,0,ord.shipping_fee) as shipping_fee,
    case when ord.currency_code in ('VND','IDR','KIP') then round(if(ord.shipping_fee is null,0,ord.shipping_fee))
             when ord.currency_code in ('THB','USD','MYR') then round(if(ord.shipping_fee is null,0,ord.shipping_fee),2)
    end as shipping_fee,


    (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = ord.created_by) as SIC,
    (select max(p.name) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = ord.created_by) as SIC_name,
    case
    when ordd.package_combo_id is not null then
    (select pcsi.package_subscription_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` pcsi where pcsi.id = ordd.package_subscription_id and pcsi.package_id = ordd.package_id)
    else ordd.package_subscription_id
    end as package_subscription

        
       
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_view` ord
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd ON (ord.id = ordd.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori ON (ord.id = ori.order_id)
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks ON (ordd.package_subscription_id = pks.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = ordd.package_id)
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bll on bll.id = ori.lead_id
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.booking_order_view` bo on RIGHT(bo.invoice_code,8) = RIGHT(ord.invoice_code,8)




WHERE 
      ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%' or ord.invoice_code like 'GRAI%'
--       AND pk.name like '%AI Tutor%'
--       AND ordd.package_combo_id is null
),

temp_table as (
SELECT oats.*,
       (SELECT us.email FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` us WHERE oats.affiliate_id = us.id) as affiliate_email,
       (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au WHERE au.user_id = oats.affiliate_id) as affiliate_category_id,
        
       if(oats.completed_at is null, oats.ngay_sale_len_don, oats.completed_at) as created_at,
       t2.first_time_purchase_phone,
       t3.first_time_purchase_email,
       ps.subscription_month,
       ps.name as subscription_name,

      case when currency_code in ('VND','IDR','KIP') then round(
          CASE WHEN(oats.sub_total != 0) then (oats.unit_price + (oats.unit_price/oats.sub_total) * (oats.shipping_fee - (oats.discount_amount + oats.voucher_discount_amount)))
            WHEN (oats.sub_total=0) then 0
            END
      )
           when currency_code in ('THB','USD','MYR') then round(
               CASE WHEN(oats.sub_total != 0) then (oats.unit_price + (oats.unit_price/oats.sub_total) * (oats.shipping_fee - (oats.discount_amount + oats.voucher_discount_amount)))
            WHEN (oats.sub_total=0) then 0
            END,2)
      end as total_oc,
       
FROM order_ai_tutor_single oats
      LEFT JOIN

      (select ans1.phone_number,
      min(timestamp_seconds(ans1.completed_at)) as first_time_purchase_phone
      from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_No_Students_Tutoring_AI` as ans1
      group by ans1.phone_number order by ans1.phone_number) t2

      on oats.student_phone = t2.phone_number

      LEFT JOIN
      
      (select ans2.email,
      min(timestamp_seconds(ans2.completed_at)) as first_time_purchase_email
      from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.Acc_No_Students_Tutoring_AI` as ans2
      group by ans2.email order by ans2.email) t3

      on oats.student_email = t3.email

      LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` ps ON (oats.package_subscription = ps.id)
),

result as
(
select tt.* EXCEPT(affiliate_email),
      if(bll.actual_lead_id is null, bll.utm_campaign,
        (select bl.utm_campaign from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bl where bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) as utm_campaign,
      if(bll.actual_lead_id is null, bll.landing_page_name,
        (select bl.landing_page_name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bl where bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) as landingpage_name,
      -- if(bll.actual_lead_id is null, bll.affiliate_id,
      --   (select bl.affiliate_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bl where bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id)) as affiliate_id,
      case when tt.invoice_code like "KYNA%" then tt.affiliate_email
           else --if(bll.actual_lead_id is null, (select max(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.kynaforkids_user` u where bll.affiliate_id = u.id),
      --     (select max(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bl, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.kynaforkids_user` u where bll.actual_lead_id = bl.id and bl.affiliate_id = u.id))               
                  (select max(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au where au.affiliate_id =  tt.affiliate_id and au.user_id = u.id)
  
      end as affiliate_email,
     
      -- case when tt.invoice_code like "KYNA%" then (SELECT ac.name FROM `kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac WHERE ac.id = tt.affiliate_category_id)
      --      else if (bll.actual_lead_id is null, (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac where 
      --     bll.affiliate_id = au.user_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id),(select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bl, 
      --     `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac 
      --     where bl.id = bll.actual_lead_id and bl.affiliate_id = au.user_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id)) 
      -- end as affiliate_category_name,

      case when tt.invoice_code like "KYNA%" then (SELECT ac.name FROM `kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac WHERE ac.id = tt.affiliate_category_id)
           else  (select ac.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_category` ac, `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user` au  where 
      tt.affiliate_id = au.affiliate_id and au.affiliate_category_id = ac.id)
      end as affiliate_category_name,


from temp_table tt
left join `kynaforkids.booking_lead_view` bll on tt.lead_id = bll.id
where tt.status = "Hoàn thành"
-- left join `kynaforkids.booking_order` bo on bo.lead_id = tt.lead_id
),

all_ai_orders as
(
SELECT 
  *,
  (SELECT max(auc.line_id) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_utm_campaign` auc
         WHERE lower(auc.name) = lower(aov.utm_campaign)) as line_id, 
  case
  when aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_phone then 'New Customers'
  else 'Returning Customers'
  end as type_order_phone,
  case
  when aov.created_at = aov.first_time_purchase_email then 'New Customers'
  else 'Returning Customers'
  end as type_order_email
FROM result aov
where aov.Mon_hoc like "%AI%"
)

select 
      date(aio.created_at) as calc_date,
      if(line.name is not null, line.name, 'Line_without_ID') as line_mkt,
      if((select max(ac.country_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_campaign` ac where line.id = ac.line_id) is null,
          aio.country_id,
          (select max(ac.country_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_campaign` ac where line.id = ac.line_id)) 
        as country_id,
          
      (select max(ac.channel_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_campaign` ac where line.id = ac.line_id) as channel_id,
      
      7 as product_id,

      sum(aio.total_oc * aio.currency_exchange_rate) as ai_single_order_vnd,
      
      count(distinct aio.invoice_code) as num_single_ai_orders
from all_ai_orders aio
left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_line` line ON (aio.line_id = line.id)
where aio.type_order_phone = 'New Customers' and aio.type_order_email = 'New Customers' 
      and aio.created_at >= '2024-08-01' 
group by calc_date, line_mkt, country_id, channel_id, product_id
order by calc_date;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.num_calls_to_report_region_asia_east1_view`
AS SELECT
    -- Extract the Looker context (report/dashboard name) from job labels
    -- This requires a specific label key to be present and contain the report name.
    -- Common Looker labels: looker-context-history_slug, looker-context-user_id, etc.
    -- You might need to inspect your BigQuery job details to find the exact label your Looker instance uses for report names.
    -- If your Looker instance applies a specific label for report names, replace 'your_looker_report_label_key'
    -- with that key (e.g., 'looker-context-dashboard', 'looker-context-explore', or a custom label you set).
    COALESCE(
        (SELECT value FROM UNNEST(labels) WHERE key = 'looker_studio_report_id'), -- Looker's internal query slug, often unique to a report/explore instance
        (SELECT value FROM UNNEST(labels) WHERE key = 'requestor'), 
        'Unknown Report' -- Fallback if no specific report label is found
    ) AS report_name,
    COUNT(job_id) AS call_count,
    sum(total_bytes_billed / POW(1024, 4)) AS tb_billed,

FROM
    -- Specify your project ID and region
    region-asia-east1.INFORMATION_SCHEMA.JOBS_BY_PROJECT
WHERE
    creation_time >= TIMESTAMP_SUB(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), INTERVAL 4 DAY) -- Last 30 days
    AND job_type = 'QUERY' -- Only consider query jobs
    AND state = 'DONE' -- Only count successful queries
    AND (
        -- Filter for jobs originating from Looker.
        -- Looker typically adds a 'requestor:looker' or similar label.
        -- You might need to verify the exact label used by your Looker instance.
        EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM UNNEST(labels) WHERE key = 'requestor' AND value = 'looker_studio')
        OR EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM UNNEST(labels) WHERE key = 'looker_studio_report_id') -- Another common Looker specific label
        -- Add other Looker-specific labels if you identify them in your BigQuery job details
    )
GROUP BY
    report_name
ORDER BY
    tb_billed desc, call_count DESC;;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.ops_manager_fixed_view`
AS with ops_manager as(
select ops_id,

      case when ops_id in (1356139,915898,869872,928157,1054120,904136,295041) then 766719 
           when ops_id in (724591,1490359) then 724591 
           when ops_id in (287342) then null
      else ops_manager_id
      end as ops_manager_id,
from `kynaforkids.ops_manager` om
group by ops_id,ops_manager_id
)

select ops_id,
       ops_manager_id,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_email_from_kynaforkids_user`(ops_manager_id) as ops_manager_email,
      (SELECT min(u.email) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id  = ops_id) as email_ops,
from ops_manager
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.order_courses_details`
AS select 
  (select min(timestamp_seconds(order_action.created_at)) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_action` order_action 
  where order_action.order_id = o.id and not order_action.order_status = 1 ) as ngay_tetesale_len_don,
	o.invoice_code,
	o.id,
  od.package_id as package_id,
	case
        when o.`status` = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
      	when o.`status` = 2 then 'Xác nhận'
        when o.`status` = 3 then 'Hoàn thành'
        when o.`status` = 4 then 'Hủy'
        else 'Khác'
	end as status,
  -- ngaltt start 21/11/2024
  -- đối với video cũ giữ nguyên vẫn lấy package name, đơn GRAI thì lấy combo name (chốt với chị Tuyết)
  -- (select package.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package`  package where package.id = od.package_id) as Mon_hoc,
  if(SUBSTR(o.invoice_code, 1,4) = 'GRAI', 
  (
    select p_combo.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package`  p
      inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` p_combo ON p_combo.id = od.package_combo_id
      inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_category` pc ON pc.id = p.category_id
      inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` item ON item.id = od.package_subscription_id 
      inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` combo ON combo.id = item.package_subscription_id
    where p.id = od.package_id),
    (select package.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package`  package where package.id = od.package_id)
  ) as Mon_hoc,

  if(SUBSTR(o.invoice_code, 1,4) = 'GRAI', 
  (
    select 
    if(combo.subscription_month = -1,
    'Mãi Mãi',
    concat(combo.subscription_month, ' tháng') ) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package`  p
      inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` p_combo ON p_combo.id = od.package_combo_id
      inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_category` pc ON pc.id = p.category_id
      inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` item ON item.id = od.package_subscription_id 
      inner join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` combo ON combo.id = item.package_subscription_id
    where p.id = od.package_id),
    (select ps.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` ps where ps.id = od.package_subscription_id) 
   ) as subscription_thang,

  -- ngaltt end 21/11/2024
	(select ori.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori where ori.order_id = o.id) as student_name,
	(select ori.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori where ori.order_id = o.id) as student_email,
	(select ori.phone_number from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori where ori.order_id = o.id) as student_phone,
	(select pm.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_method` pm where pm.id = o.payment_method_id) as payment_method,
	case
      when o.payment_method_status = 1 then 'Chờ thanh toán'
      when o.payment_method_status = 2 then 'Đã thanh toán'
      when o.payment_method_status = 3 then 'Thanh toán thất bại'
      when o.payment_method_status = 4 then 'Chờ giao hàng'
 		  when o.payment_method_status = 5 then 'Đang giao hàng'
      when o.payment_method_status = 6 then 'Đã giao hàng'
      when o.payment_method_status = 7 then 'Đang trả hàng'
      when o.payment_method_status = 8 then 'Đã trả hàng'
      else null
	end as payment_status,
    (select pg.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_gateway` pg where pg.id = o.shipping_method_id) as shipping_company,
    (select max(pt.transaction_code) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_transaction` pt where pt.order_id = o.id) as partner_code,
    o.sub_total,
    od.unit_price,
    if(od.discount_amount is null,0,od.discount_amount) as discount_amount,
    if(od.voucher_discount_amount is null,0,od.voucher_discount_amount) as voucher_discount_amount,
    if(o.shipping_fee is null,0,o.shipping_fee) as shipping_fee,
    o.created_at as created_at,
    o.updated_at as updated_at,
    timestamp_seconds(o.completed_at) as completed_at, 
    (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = o.created_by) as SIC,
    (select max(p.name) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = o.created_by) as SIC_name
from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` o
left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` od on od.order_id = o.id
where o.country_id =3;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.order_courses_details_thai`
AS select 
  (select min(timestamp_seconds(order_action.created_at)) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_action` order_action 
  where order_action.order_id = o.id and not order_action.order_status = 1 ) as ngay_tetesale_len_don,
	o.invoice_code,
	o.id,
  od.package_id as package_id,
	case
        when o.`status` = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
      	when o.`status` = 2 then 'Xác nhận'
        when o.`status` = 3 then 'Hoàn thành'
        when o.`status` = 4 then 'Hủy'
        else 'Khác'
	end as status,
	(select package.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package`  package where package.id = od.package_id) as Mon_hoc,
	(select ori.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori where ori.order_id = o.id) as student_name,
	(select ori.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori where ori.order_id = o.id) as student_email,
	(select ori.phone_number from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori where ori.order_id = o.id) as student_phone,
	(select pm.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_method` pm where pm.id = o.payment_method_id) as payment_method,
	case
      when o.payment_method_status = 1 then 'Chờ thanh toán'
      when o.payment_method_status = 2 then 'Đã thanh toán'
      when o.payment_method_status = 3 then 'Thanh toán thất bại'
      when o.payment_method_status = 4 then 'Chờ giao hàng'
 		  when o.payment_method_status = 5 then 'Đang giao hàng'
      when o.payment_method_status = 6 then 'Đã giao hàng'
      when o.payment_method_status = 7 then 'Đang trả hàng'
      when o.payment_method_status = 8 then 'Đã trả hàng'
      else null
	end as payment_status,
    (select pg.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_gateway` pg where pg.id = o.shipping_method_id) as shipping_company,
    (select max(pt.transaction_code) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.payment_transaction` pt where pt.order_id = o.id) as partner_code,
    o.sub_total,
    od.unit_price,
    if(od.discount_amount is null,0,od.discount_amount) as discount_amount,
    if(od.voucher_discount_amount is null,0,od.voucher_discount_amount) as voucher_discount_amount,
    if(o.shipping_fee is null,0,o.shipping_fee) as shipping_fee,
    timestamp_seconds(o.created_at) as created_at,
    timestamp_seconds(o.updated_at) as updated_at,
    timestamp_seconds(o.completed_at) as completed_at,
    (select u.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u where u.id = o.created_by) as SIC,
    (select max(p.name) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = o.created_by) as SIC_name
from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` o
left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` od on od.order_id = o.id
where o.country_id = 1;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.order_package_combo_single_info_view`
AS WITH 
order_single AS
(SELECT 
        --ord.*,
        ord.id as order_id,
        date(timestamp_seconds(ord.created_at)) as created_at,
        ord.is_activated,
      --   date(ord.updated_at) as updated_at,
      --   date(ord.completed_at) as completed_at,
        ori.name,
        ori.phone_number,
        ord.created_by,
        -- ord.telesale_id,

        -- ord.register_source,        
        -- ord.country_id,
        -- `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(ord.country_id) as country,
        -- ord.currency_exchange_rate,
        -- ord.total as total_oc,
        
        
       -- ord.user_id,
        -- ori.phone_number as order_phone_number,
        -- ori.email as order_email,
        ori.lead_id,
      --   if((ori.phone_number) in (SELECT * FROM users_1_1_phone_number),"Đã học 1-1","Chưa học 1-1") as check_1_1, 

        

        ord.invoice_code as order_code,
        ord.status as order_status_id,
        -- ord.payment_method_id,
        ord.payment_method_status as payment_status_id,
        -- ord.affiliate_id,
        -- (SELECT email FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user us WHERE ord.affiliate_id = us.id) as affiliate_email,
        -- (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user au WHERE au.user_id = ord.affiliate_id) as affiliate_category_id,
        -- ord.utm_campaign,


        ordd.package_id,
        ordd.package_subscription_id,
        ordd.package_combo_id,
        pks.subscription_month,
        pks.name as subscription_name,
        pks.price as subscription_price,
        pk.name as package_name,

        
       
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` ord
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd ON (ord.id = ordd.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori ON (ord.id = ori.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks ON (ordd.package_subscription_id = pks.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = ordd.package_id)



WHERE   ordd.package_combo_id is null
     -- AND ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%' or ord.invoice_code like 'GRAI%'
     -- AND pk.name like '%AI Tutor%'    
),

order_combo AS
(SELECT 
        --ord.*,
        ord.id as order_id,
        date(timestamp_seconds(ord.created_at)) as created_at,
        ord.is_activated,
      --   date(ord.updated_at) as updated_at,
      --   date(ord.completed_at) as completed_at,
        ori.name,
        ori.phone_number,

        ord.created_by,
        -- ord.telesale_id,
        -- ord.register_source,        
        -- ord.country_id,
        -- `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country`(ord.country_id) as country,
        -- ord.currency_exchange_rate,
        -- ord.total as total_oc,
        
        
       -- ord.user_id,
        -- ori.phone_number as order_phone_number,
        -- ori.email as order_email,
        ori.lead_id,
      --   if((ori.phone_number) in (SELECT * FROM users_1_1_phone_number),"Đã học 1-1","Chưa học 1-1") as check_1_1, 


        ord.invoice_code as order_code,
        ord.status as order_status_id,
        -- case when ord.status = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
        --      when ord.status = 2 then 'Đã xác nhận'
        --      when ord.status = 3 then 'Hoàn thành'
        --      when ord.status = 4 then 'Hủy'
        --      when ord.status = 5 then 'Đã hoàn tiền'   
        -- end as order_status,

        -- ord.payment_method_id,
        ord.payment_method_status,
        
        -- ord.affiliate_id,  
        -- ord.affiliate_email,
        -- ord.affiliate_category_name,
        

        -- ord.invoice_code as order_code,
        -- ord.status as order_status_id,
        -- ord.payment_method_id,
        -- ord.payment_method_status as payment_status_id,
        -- ord.affiliate_id,
        -- (SELECT email FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user us WHERE ord.affiliate_id = us.id) as affiliate_email,
        -- (SELECT au.affiliate_category_id FROM kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.affiliate_user au WHERE au.user_id = ord.affiliate_id) as affiliate_category_id,
        -- ord.utm_campaign,


        ordd.package_id,
        ordd.package_subscription_id,
        ordd.package_combo_id,
        pks.subscription_month,
        pks.name as subscription_name,
        pks.price as subscription_price,
        pk.name as package_name,


        
       
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order` ord
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_detail` ordd ON (ord.id = ordd.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.order_register_info` ori ON (ord.id = ori.order_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids.package_combo_subscription_item` pcs ON (ordd.package_subscription_id = pcs.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package_subscriptions` pks ON (pcs.package_subscription_id = pks.id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = pcs.package_id)
-- LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.package` pk ON (pk.id = ordd.package_combo_id)


WHERE 
        ordd.package_combo_id is not null
     -- AND ord.invoice_code like 'KYNA%' or ord.invoice_code like 'GRAI%'
     -- AND pk.name like '%AI%'
),

order_all AS
(
SELECT * FROM order_single

UNION ALL

SELECT * FROM order_combo

)

select * from order_all

;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.potential_economy_package_students_view`
AS with 
target_student_1 AS (
SELECT bs.user_id, bs.student_code, 
      --  bsp.program_id,
       count(distinct bsn.id) as num_completed_bookings, 
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn
        ON (bs.user_id = bssn.student_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp
        ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
        ON (bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id and bsp.program_id = bsn.program_id)

WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0
      and bs.country_id = 3
      and bsp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.program_type in (2) or bp.program_model in (2) or bp.number_of_shift in (1,3,4))
      and bsp.program_id not in (3,106,107,108,109,110,111,112)
      AND bsn.status_id in (4,5)
      And bsn.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.program_type in (2) or bp.program_model in (2) or bp.number_of_shift in (1,3,4))
      and bsn.program_id not in (3,106,107,108,109,110,111,112)
      AND cast(bsn.begin_at as datetime) < current_datetime("UTC+7")     
      --AND (date(bsn.begin_at) >= '2024-10-01' AND date(bsn.begin_at) <= '2024-10-31') 
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code--, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính tổng số lesson còn lại của học sinh ở các chương trình mà học sinh đang học với các ràng buộc như trên 
remaining_bookings_program AS (
SELECT bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id,
       max(coalesce(bsp.remain_lesson,0)) as bookings_program_remain
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0 
      and bsp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.program_type in (2) or bp.program_model in (2) or bp.number_of_shift in (1,3,4))
      and bsp.program_id not in (3,106,107,108,109,110,111,112)

GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính số booking đã được chạy ở các trạng thái draft, new, waiting approve, approved (lấy ở ngày hiện tại trở đi)
remaining_bookings_booked AS (
SELECT 
      bs.user_id, 
      bs.student_code, 
      bsp.program_id, 
      count(distinct bsn.id) as bookings_booked
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn
        ON (bs.user_id = bssn.student_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
        ON (bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id and bsp.program_id = bsn.program_id)
WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0 
      AND bsn.status_id in (1,2,3,4)
      and bsn.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.program_type in (2) or bp.program_model in (2) or bp.number_of_shift in (1,3,4))
      and bsn.program_id not in (3,106,107,108,109,110,111,112)
      AND cast(bsn.begin_at as datetime) > current_datetime("UTC+7")
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính tổng số booking còn lại của học viên (lấy 2 số trên cộng lại với nhau)
remaining_bookings AS (
SELECT rbp.user_id, rbp.student_code, --rbp.program_id,-- rbp.program_name, 
       max(rbp.bookings_program_remain) + max(coalesce(rbb.bookings_booked,0)) as total_remaining_lessons,
       --`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_student_name_from_profile_by_student_id`(rbp.user_id) as student_name 
FROM remaining_bookings_program rbp
LEFT JOIN remaining_bookings_booked rbb ON(rbp.user_id = rbb.user_id AND rbp.program_id = rbb.program_id)
WHERE rbp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.program_type in (2) or bp.program_model in (2) or bp.number_of_shift in (1,3,4))
      and rbp.program_id not in (3,106,107,108,109,110,111,112)

GROUP BY rbp.user_id, rbp.student_code--, rbp.program_id
),

-- Ghép các bảng trên để có bảng target_students
target_students AS
(
SELECT 
      ts1.*, 
      --rb.program_name, rb.subject, 
      rb.total_remaining_lessons,  
FROM target_student_1 ts1
LEFT JOIN remaining_bookings rb ON(ts1.user_id = rb.user_id) --AND ts1.program_id = rb.program_id)
where rb.total_remaining_lessons > 0
),

temp_result AS 
(
SELECT ts.*,   -- student code, số buổi còn lại
       `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_student_phone_number`(ts.user_id) as phone_number,
       (select user_type_id from `kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bst.student_code = ts.student_code) as user_type_id, -- id của loại học viên
  
        
FROM target_students ts

),

potential_economy_package_student_booking_info AS
(
SELECT tr.* except(user_id),
       tr.user_id as student_id,
       `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_student_name_from_profile_by_student_id`(tr.user_id) as student_name,
       case when tr.user_type_id = 1 then 'Trẻ em'
            when tr.user_type_id = 2 then 'Người lớn'
            else "Chưa rõ"
       end as loai_hoc_vien,
 
FROM temp_result tr
-- left join  `kynaforkids.ops_manager` omn on omn.ops_id = tr.ops_id
)

select t.*,
      case 
            when t.student_code in (select student_code from `datateam_kynaforkids.hieu_qua_ghep_lop_economy_0f2ad318-1e72-496a-9a5b-d7ecf36b7c11_y5nn10f0ud_2`) then 'Còn tham gia'
            when t.student_code in (select student_code from `datateam_kynaforkids.hieu_qua_ghep_lop_economy_0f2ad318-1e72-496a-9a5b-d7ecf36b7c11_y5nn10f0ud`) then 'Đã hủy'
            else 'Chưa đăng ký'
      end as economy_status

      -- case when t2.student_code is not null then 'Còn tham gia'
      --      when t1.student_code is not null then ''
from potential_economy_package_student_booking_info t
-- left join `datateam_kynaforkids.hieu_qua_ghep_lop_economy_0f2ad318-1e72-496a-9a5b-d7ecf36b7c11_y5nn10f0ud` t1 on t.student_code=t1.student_code
-- left join  `datateam_kynaforkids.hieu_qua_ghep_lop_economy_0f2ad318-1e72-496a-9a5b-d7ecf36b7c11_y5nn10f0ud_2` t2 on t2.student_code=t.student_code

;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.refund_order_2022_10_01`
AS select 
  (select bst.student_code from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bst.user_id = t1.student_id) as student_code,
  (select max(p.name) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = t1.student_id) as student_name,
  case
      when if(t1.type = 1,(select t2.international_country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` t2 where t2.id = t1.order_id)
      ,(select bst.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bst.user_id = t1.student_id)) = 1 then 'Thailand'
      when if(t1.type = 1,(select t2.international_country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` t2 where t2.id = t1.order_id)
      ,(select bst.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bst.user_id = t1.student_id)) = 2 then 'Indo'
      when if(t1.type = 1,(select t2.international_country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` t2 where t2.id = t1.order_id)
      ,(select bst.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bst.user_id = t1.student_id)) = 3 then 'Việt Nam'
      when if(t1.type = 1,(select t2.international_country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` t2 where t2.id = t1.order_id)
      ,(select bst.country_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bst.user_id = t1.student_id)) = 4 then 'Khác'
  end as country
  -- ngaltt start
   , (select t2.contract_code from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` t2 where t2.id = t1.order_id) as contract_code,
  -- ngaltt end
  if(t1.type = 1,(select t2.email from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` t2 where t2.id = t1.order_id),
   (select max(u1.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u1 where u1.id = u.parent_id))
  as email,
  t1.program_id,
  case
			when t1.program_id = 1 then 'Kyna English VIP'
			when t1.program_id = 2 then 'Kyna English SPEAK'
			when t1.program_id = 3 then 'Chương trình Demo'
			when t1.program_id = 4 then 'Kyna English Tutorials'
			when t1.program_id = 5 then 'Kyna English Class'
      when t1.program_id = 6 then 'Kyna English Junior'
      when t1.program_id = 7 then 'Kyna English Primary'
      when t1.program_id = 8 then 'Chương trình Test Online'
      when t1.program_id = 9 then 'Kyna English SPEAK JUNIOR'
      when t1.program_id = 10 then 'Kyna English IELTS'
      when t1.program_id = 11 then 'Kyna English Business'
      when t1.program_id = 12 then 'Toán Tiểu Học'
      when t1.program_id = 13 then 'Test Online (2 shifts)'
      when t1.program_id = 14 then 'Kyna English Class Vip'
      when t1.program_id = 15 then 'Kyna English Class Speak'
      when t1.program_id = 16 then 'Kyna English Secondary'
      when t1.program_id = 17 then 'Kyna English VIP 45MINS'
      when t1.program_id = 18 then 'Kyna English SPEAK 45MINS'
      when t1.program_id = 19 then 'Kyna English Tutorials 45MINS'
      when t1.program_id = 20 then 'Toán Tiểu Học (Mẫu giáo - Lớp 1 - Lớp 2)'
      when t1.program_id = 21 then 'KE Public Speaking I'
      when t1.program_id = 22 then 'KE Public Speaking II'
	end as program,
  if(t1.type = 1,t1.amount,0) * (select t2.Currency_Exchange_Rate from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` t2 where t2.id = t1.order_id) as refund_order,
  if(t1.type = 1,t1.amount,0) as refund_order_NT,
  if(t1.type = 1,if(t1.difference_amount is null,0,t1.difference_amount), 0) * 
  (select t2.Currency_Exchange_Rate from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` t2 where t2.id = t1.order_id) as difference_amount,
  if(t1.type = 1,if(t1.difference_amount is null,0,t1.difference_amount), 0)  as difference_amount_NT,
  if(t1.type = 2,if(t1.difference_amount is null,0,t1.difference_amount), 0) *
  (select min(bo.Currency_Exchange_Rate) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo, 
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bst.user_id = t1.student_id and bo.student_code = bst.student_code and t1.program_id = bo.program_id) as difference_amount_deactive,
    if(t1.type = 2,if(t1.difference_amount is null,0,t1.difference_amount), 0) as difference_amount_deactive_NT,
  if(t1.type = 1,(select date(t2.accounting_date)from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_view` t2 where t2.id = t1.order_id),date(timestamp_seconds(t1.created_at))) as refund_date
from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order_refund_history` t1
left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u on u.id = t1.student_id
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.students_economy_package_join_left_all_time`
AS with
economy_all_temp as
(
    (
    select 
          user_id,
          date(timestamp_seconds(created_at)) as action_date,
          action 
    from `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.booking_student_program_action_economy_view` 
    )

    union all

    (
    select 
          student_id as user_id,
          action_date,
          action
    from `datateam_kynaforkids.students_join_economy_bf_20250727`
    )

    union all

    (
    select 
          student_id as user_id,
          action_date,
          action
    from `datateam_kynaforkids.students_left_economy_bf_20250727`
    )
),

economy_all as
(
select 
      user_id,
      action_date,
      action 
from 
(
    SELECT *,
          row_number() over (partition by user_id, action order by action_date desc) as rn
    FROM economy_all_temp
)
where rn = 1
order by action_date desc
)


select 
      ea.*,
      bst.student_code,
      `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_student_name_from_profile_by_student_id`(bst.user_id) as student_name,
      case when action = 9 then "Đăng ký"
           when action = 10 then "Hủy"
      end as action_description,    
      case when bst.user_type_id = 1 then 'Trẻ em'
           when bst.user_type_id = 2 then 'Người lớn'
           else 'Chưa rõ'
      end as student_type

from economy_all ea
left join `kynaforkids.booking_student` bst using(user_id)


;

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.students_join_economy_bf_20250727`
(
  student_id INT64,
  student_code STRING,
  action_date DATE,
  action INT64
);

CREATE TABLE `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.students_left_economy_bf_20250727`

  action_date DATE,
  action INT64

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.students_with_3_level_address_view`
AS select 
        -- bo.student_code,
        right(bog.phone_number,9) as phone_number, 
        ward.name as ward,
        ward.district_name as district,
        case when ward.province_name = 'Thành phố Hồ Chí Mi' then 'Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh' 
             when ward.province_name like '%Vũng%' then 'Tỉnh Bà Rịa - Vũng Tàu'
             else ward.province_name
        end as province,
        -- count(distinct bo.student_code) as num_students


from `kynaforkids.booking_order_gift` bog
left join `kynaforkids.location` loc on bog.location_id = loc.id 
left join `kynaforkids.gso_commune` ward on ward.gso_id = loc.gov_id
left join `kynaforkids.booking_order` bo on left(bog.invoice_code,13) = bo.invoice_code
where bo.international_country_id = 3 and ward.name is not null
group by phone_number, location_id, ward, district, province,  bo.student_code;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.tc_math_hoc_vien_gvcd_view`
AS --Nhờ bên anh làm thêm 1 cái Datastudio chi tiết danh sách HVCĐ nhé ạ, bao gồm các thông tin:
-- Teacher ID
-- Teacher Name
-- Mã KE HVCĐ
-- Tên học viên
-- Ops In Charge
-- Loại học viên: Trẻ em/người lớn
-- Tên chương trình
-- Số buổi còn lại

with 
-- HV chương trình số buổi còn lại
target_student_1 AS (
SELECT bs.user_id, bs.student_code, 
       bsp.program_id,
       count(distinct bsn.id) as num_bookings, 
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn
        ON (bs.user_id = bssn.student_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp
        ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
        ON (bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id and bsp.program_id = bsn.program_id)

WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0
      -- and bs.country_id = 3
      AND bsp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id = 3 or bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.subject = 1) 
      AND bsn.status_id in (4,5)
      AND bsn.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id = 3 or bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.subject = 1)
  	  AND cast(bsn.begin_at as datetime) < current_datetime("UTC+7")     
      --AND (date(bsn.begin_at) >= '2024-10-01' AND date(bsn.begin_at) <= '2024-10-31') 
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính tổng số lesson còn lại của học sinh ở các chương trình mà học sinh đang học với các ràng buộc như trên 
remaining_bookings_program AS (
SELECT bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id,
       max(coalesce(bsp.remain_lesson,0)) as bookings_program_remain
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0 
      AND bsp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id = 3 or bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.subject = 1)
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính số booking đã được chạy ở các trạng thái draft, new, waiting approve, approved (lấy ở ngày hiện tại trở đi)
remaining_bookings_booked AS (
SELECT 
      bs.user_id, 
      bs.student_code, 
      bsp.program_id, 
      count(distinct bsn.id) as bookings_booked
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bs
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_program` bsp ON (bsp.user_id = bs.user_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bssn
        ON (bs.user_id = bssn.student_id)
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bsn
        ON (bssn.booking_session_id = bsn.id and bsp.program_id = bsn.program_id)
WHERE bs.is_user_test = 0 
      AND bsn.status_id in (1,2,3,4)
      AND bsn.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id = 3 or bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.subject = 1)
      AND cast(bsn.begin_at as datetime) > current_datetime("UTC+7")
GROUP BY bs.user_id, bs.student_code, bsp.program_id
),

-- Tính tổng số booking còn lại của học viên (lấy 2 số trên cộng lại với nhau)
remaining_bookings AS (
SELECT rbp.user_id, rbp.student_code, rbp.program_id,-- rbp.program_name, 
       max(coalesce(rbp.bookings_program_remain,0)) + max(coalesce(rbb.bookings_booked,0)) as total_remaining_lessons,
       --`kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_student_name_from_profile_by_student_id`(rbp.user_id) as student_name 
FROM remaining_bookings_program rbp
LEFT JOIN remaining_bookings_booked rbb ON(rbp.user_id = rbb.user_id AND rbp.program_id = rbb.program_id)
WHERE rbp.program_id not in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 2 or bp.id = 3 or bp.type in (2,3,4) or bp.subject = 1)
GROUP BY rbp.user_id, rbp.student_code, rbp.program_id
),

-- Ghép các bảng trên để có bảng target_students
students_with_remain_bookings AS
(
SELECT 
      ts1.*,
      -- rb.program_id, 
      --rb.program_name, rb.subject, 
      rb.total_remaining_lessons,  
FROM target_student_1 ts1
LEFT JOIN remaining_bookings rb ON(ts1.user_id = rb.user_id AND ts1.program_id = rb.program_id)
where rb.total_remaining_lessons > 0
),

-- students_with_remain_bookings as
-- (
-- select 
--        ts.student_code,
--        ts.program_id
--        sum(ts.total_remaining_lessons) as total_remaining_lessons,
        
-- from target_students ts
-- group by student_code 
-- ),

-- HV và GVCĐ
hv_gvcd as
(
select
      bst.student_code,
      (
        SELECT
              max(p.name)
        FROM
              `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p
        where p.user_id = bspd.student_id
      ) as student_name,

      bt.user_id as teacher_id,
      (
        SELECT
              max(p.name)
        FROM
             `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p
        WHERE
              p.user_id= bt.user_id) as teacher_name,
      
      bspd.program_id,
      (select bp.name from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.id = bspd.program_id) as program,

      string_agg(distinct cast(bspd.day as string), ", ") as week_days,

      string_agg(distinct cast(schedule_id as string), ", ") as schedule_ids,




from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student_priority_date` bspd
inner join `kynaforkids.booking_student` bst on bst.user_id = bspd.student_id
inner join `kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt on bt.user_id = bspd.fixed_teacher_id
where bspd.fixed_teacher_id is not null and bspd.only_map_current_teacher = 1
      -- and student_id = 102
      and bst.student_code like 'K%'
      and bspd.program_id in (select bp.id from `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp where bp.program_type = 1 and bp.type not in (2,3,4) and bp.id != 3 and bp.subject = 2)
group by student_code, student_id, teacher_id, program_id
)

select 
        hv_gvcd.*,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_country_teacher`((select bt.country_id from `kynaforkids.booking_teacher` bt where bt.user_id = hv_gvcd.teacher_id)) as teacher_country,
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_booking_student_country`(bst.country_id) as student_country,
        srb.total_remaining_lessons,
        case when bst.user_type_id = 1 then 'Trẻ em'
             when bst.user_type_id = 2 then 'Người lớn'
             else "Unknown"
        end as loai_hv,
        (select `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.func_get_email_from_kynaforkids_user`(bst.ops_id)) as ops_email,   

        
from hv_gvcd 
inner join `kynaforkids.booking_student` bst on bst.student_code = hv_gvcd.student_code
left join students_with_remain_bookings srb on hv_gvcd.student_code = srb.student_code and hv_gvcd.program_id = srb.program_id
where srb.total_remaining_lessons is not null

;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.test_fixed_date_range_for_materialized_view`
AS WITH aff_campaign_inf AS
(
  SELECT
    aci.`campaign_id`,
    ac.name as campaign_name,
    date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aci.`date`)+ INTERVAL 7 HOUR) as date_spend,
    aci.`spend`,
    ac.account_id,
    ac.channel_id,
    ac.effective_status,
    ac.product_id,
    ac.user_id,
    ac.country_id,
    ac.line_id,
  
    CASE
          WHEN ac.channel_id = 1 AND date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aci.`date`)+ INTERVAL 7 HOUR) >= '2025-03-01' THEN ROUND(1.05 * aci.spend)
          WHEN ac.channel_id = 1 AND date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aci.`date`)+ INTERVAL 7 HOUR) < '2025-03-01' THEN ROUND(1.07 * aci.spend)
          WHEN ac.channel_id = 2 THEN ROUND(1.05 * aci.spend)
          WHEN ac.channel_id = 3 THEN ROUND(1.05 * aci.spend)
    END AS spend_with_tax,
  FROM
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_campaign_insight` aci

  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_campaign` ac
        ON ac.id = aci.campaign_id
  WHERE date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aci.`date`)) >= '2022-01-01'
    AND date(TIMESTAMP_SECONDS(aci.`date`)) <= '2025-04-30'  -- Added upper bound for date range

),

line_name_spend as(
  SELECT  ci.date_spend, ci.channel_id, ci.product_id, ci.country_id, 
        SUM(ci.spend) as spend, SUM(ci.spend_with_tax) as spend_with_tax,
        CASE WHEN ci.line_id is not null then line.name
             ELSE 'Line_without_ID'
        END as line_mkt
  FROM aff_campaign_inf ci
  LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_line` line ON(line.id = ci.line_id)
  GROUP BY ci.date_spend, line_mkt, ci.country_id, ci.channel_id, ci.product_id
  ORDER BY date_spend 
),

line_lead_date AS 
(
SELECT 
        lead_date, line_id,
        SUM(num_leads) as num_leads,
        SUM(num_leads_test_approved) as num_leads_test_approved,
        SUM(num_leads_test) as num_leads_test,
        SUM(leads_wait_for_order) as leads_wait_for_order,
        max(country_id) as country_id,

FROM
(
SELECT
       date(blv.created_at) as lead_date, 
        blv.affiliate_campaign as utm_campaign,
        COUNTIF(blv.id is not null and blv.Bloked_Open = 'Open') as num_leads,
        COUNT(blv.test_approved_lead_id) as num_leads_test_approved,
        COUNTIF(blv.nhan_xet_gv = 'Đã có nhận xét') as num_leads_test,
        COUNTIF(blv.lead_status = 'Ghi danh - Chờ lên đơn' and blv.Bloked_Open = 'Open') as leads_wait_for_order,

        if((select max(auc.country_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_utm_campaign` auc where lower(name) = lower(blv.affiliate_campaign)) is null,
            max(blv.country_id), 
            (select max(auc.country_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_utm_campaign` auc where lower(name) = lower(blv.affiliate_campaign))) as country_id,
        
        (SELECT max(line_id) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_utm_campaign` 
         WHERE lower(name) = lower(blv.affiliate_campaign)) as line_id,
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.mkt_booking_lead_view` blv
  WHERE date(blv.created_at) >= '2022-01-01'
    AND date(blv.created_at) <= '2025-04-30'  -- Added upper bound for date range
    AND blv.id NOT IN
        (
          SELECT blv.id 
          FROM  `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.mkt_booking_lead_view` blv
          WHERE date(blv.created_at) >= '2022-01-01'
               AND date(blv.created_at) <= '2025-04-30'  -- Added upper bound for date range
               AND blv.reason_cancel_id IN ('20','18','17','9','8')
        )
  GROUP BY lead_date, blv.affiliate_campaign, line_id
  ORDER By lead_date
)
GROUP BY lead_date, line_id
)
,

line_order_date AS (
SELECT
        date(oc.ngay_tao_don) as order_date,
        (SELECT MAX(line_id) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_utm_campaign` 
         WHERE lower(name) = lower(oc.affiliate_campaign)) as line_id,
        MAX(oc.country_id) as country_id,
        SUM(oc.total_VND) as order_value,
        COUNT(oc.order_id) as num_orders,
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.mkt_booking_order_old_new_students_view` oc
WHERE date(oc.ngay_tao_don) >= '2022-01-01' 
  AND date(oc.ngay_tao_don) <= '2025-04-30'  -- Added upper bound for date range
GROUP BY order_date, line_id
ORDER BY order_date 
),

line_lead_order AS
(
SELECT 
        IF(lld.lead_date is null, lod.order_date, lld.lead_date) as calc_date, 
        lld.lead_date,
        lod.order_date,
        IF(lld.line_id is null, lod.line_id, lld.line_id) as line_id,
        lld.line_id as line_id_lead, 
        lod.line_id as line_id_od, 
        lld.num_leads, 
        lld.num_leads_test, 
        lld.num_leads_test_approved, 
        lld.leads_wait_for_order, 
        lod.num_orders, 
        lod.order_value,
        IF(lld.country_id is null, lod.country_id, lld.country_id) as country_id, 
FROM line_lead_date lld
FULL JOIN line_order_date lod
ON (lld.lead_date = lod.order_date AND lld.line_id = lod.line_id)
),

line_name_lead_order AS (
SELECT
    llo.calc_date,
    SUM(num_leads) as num_leads, 
    SUM(num_leads_test) as num_leads_test, 
    SUM(num_leads_test_approved) as num_leads_test_approved, 
    SUM(num_orders) as num_orders, 
    SUM(leads_wait_for_order) as leads_wait_for_order, 
    SUM(order_value) as order_value,
    CASE WHEN llo.line_id is not null then line.name
        ELSE 'Line_without_ID'
    END AS line_mkt,
    IF(llo.country_id is null, (SELECT max(auc.country_id) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_utm_campaign` auc 
         WHERE llo.line_id = auc.line_id), llo.country_id) as country_id,
    
    (SELECT max(auc.product_id) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_utm_campaign` auc 
         WHERE llo.line_id = auc.line_id) as product_id,

    (SELECT max(auc.channel_id) FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_utm_campaign` auc 
         WHERE llo.line_id = auc.line_id) as channel_id,         
FROM line_lead_order llo
LEFT JOIN `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.adwords_meta_line` line ON(line.id = llo.line_id)
GROUP BY llo.calc_date, line_mkt, country_id, channel_id, product_id
ORDER BY calc_date
),

performance_table as 
(SELECT 
  IF(lot.calc_date is null, sp.date_spend, lot.calc_date) as calc_date,
  IF(lot.line_mkt is null, sp.line_mkt, lot.line_mkt) as line_mkt,
  IF(sp.country_id is null, lot.country_id, sp.country_id) as country_id,
  IF(lot.channel_id is null, sp.channel_id, lot.channel_id) as channel_id,
  IF(lot.product_id is null, sp.product_id, lot.product_id) as product_id,
  SUM(sp.spend) as spend, 
  SUM(sp.spend_with_tax) as spend_with_tax,
  SUM(lot.num_leads) as num_leads,
  SUM(lot.num_leads_test) as num_leads_test,
  SUM(lot.num_leads_test_approved) as num_leads_test_approved,
  SUM(lot.leads_wait_for_order) as leads_wait_for_order,
  SUM(lot.num_orders) as num_orders,
  SUM(lot.order_value) as order_value,
  
FROM line_name_lead_order lot
FULL JOIN line_name_spend sp
ON (lot.calc_date = sp.date_spend AND lot.line_mkt = sp.line_mkt AND lot.country_id = sp.country_id AND lot.channel_id = sp.channel_id AND lot.product_id=sp.product_id) 

WHERE (lot.calc_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2025-04-30') OR (sp.date_spend BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2025-04-30')  -- Added date range filter

GROUP BY calc_date, line_mkt, country_id, channel_id, product_id
ORDER BY calc_date 
)

SELECT pt.*,
      case 
          WHEN country_id = 1 THEN 'Thailand'
          WHEN country_id = 2 THEN 'Indo'
          WHEN country_id = 3 THEN 'Việt Nam'
          WHEN country_id = 4 THEN 'Khác'
          WHEN country_id = 5 THEN 'Lào'
          WHEN country_id = 6 THEN 'Malaysia'
          else "Chưa biết"
      end as country,

      case 
            when product_id = 1 then 'Kids - 1 kèm 1'
            when product_id = 2 then 'KEA - 1 kèm 1'
            when product_id = 3 then 'Toán - 1 kèm 1'
            when product_id = 4 then 'Kids - Class'
            when product_id = 5 then 'Tuyển dụng GV'
            when product_id = 6 then 'Khác'
            when product_id = 7 then 'AI Tutor'
            else "Chưa biết"
      end as product_name,

      case 
          when channel_id = 1 then 'Facebook'
          when channel_id = 2 then 'Tiktok'
          when channel_id = 3 then 'Google'
          else "Chưa biết"
      end as channel_name

FROM performance_table pt
WHERE pt.calc_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2025-04-30'  -- Final date range filter;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.to_duo_student_analysis_view`
AS with
bookings_students_duo_from_july_2025 as
(
select
      bss.student_id,
      bs.id as booking_id,
      bs.lesson_id,
      bs.program_id,
      bp.name as program,
      bs.begin_at,
      date(bs.begin_at) as ngay_hoc,
      FORMAT_TIMESTAMP("%H:%M", bs.begin_at) AS time_hh_mm,
      -- case when bs.lesson_id in (select distinct lesson_id from `datateam_kynaforkids.kyna_english_duo_junior_lesson_id_list`) then "Duo Junior"
      --      when bs.lesson_id in (select distinct lesson_id from `datateam_kynaforkids.kyna_english_duo_primary_lesson_id_list`) then "Duo Primary"
      --      else "Unknown"
      -- end as to_duo_program

-- from `datateam_kynaforkids.temp_students_transfer_to_duo` sduo 
from `datateam_kynaforkids.temp_students_accept_convert_to_duo` sduo 
left join `kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on bss.student_id = sduo.user_id 
left join `kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs on bss.booking_session_id = bs.id
left join `kynaforkids.booking_program` bp on bp.id = bs.program_id
where date(bs.begin_at) >= '2025-07-01'
      and bs.status_id in (1,2,3,4,5)
      and bp.id in (17,6,39,41,73,79)
),

group_hv_ngay_gio as
(
select
      -- to_duo_program,
      ngay_hoc,
      time_hh_mm,
      count(distinct student_id) as num_students,

from bookings_students_duo_from_july_2025
group by ngay_hoc, time_hh_mm
order by ngay_hoc, num_students desc
),

room_allocation as
(
select 
      gr.*,
      case when gr.num_students > 2 then
                                          case when mod(gr.num_students,3) = 0 then div(gr.num_students,3)
                                               when mod(gr.num_students,3) = 1 then div(gr.num_students - 4,3)
                                               when mod(gr.num_students,3) = 2 then div(gr.num_students - 2,3)
                                          end
           else 0
      end as num_3_student_rooms,
      
      case when gr.num_students >= 2 then
                                          case when mod(gr.num_students,3) = 0 then 0
                                               when mod(gr.num_students,3) = 1 then 2
                                               when mod(gr.num_students,3) = 2 then 1
                                          end
           else 0
      end as num_2_student_rooms,

      case when gr.num_students = 1 then 1
           else 0
      end as num_1_student_rooms,
            
from group_hv_ngay_gio gr
),

result as 
(
select 
      ra.*,
      3 * num_3_student_rooms * (44004 - round((22000*0.1+32000*0.9)/3,0) - 23178)as cost_saved_3std_rooms,
      2 * num_2_student_rooms * (44004 - round((22000*0.1+27000*0.9)/2,0) - 23178) as cost_saved_2std_rooms,
      -- num_1_student_rooms * (44004 - 22000 - 23718) as cost_saved_1std_rooms,
      0 as cost_saved_1std_rooms,
from room_allocation ra

)

select 
      r.*,
      cost_saved_3std_rooms + cost_saved_2std_rooms + cost_saved_1std_rooms as total_cost_saved
from result r
;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.view_booking_1_10`
AS select 
bs.id,
bs.name as booking_name,
(select bc.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_class` bc where bc.id = bs.booking_class_id) as class_name,
case 
when (select bc.status from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_class` bc where bc.id = bs.booking_class_id) = 1 then 'Mới tạo'
when (select bc.status from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_class` bc where bc.id = bs.booking_class_id) = 2 then 'Đang học'
when (select bc.status from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_class` bc where bc.id = bs.booking_class_id) = 3 then 'Lớp chuẩn bị hoàn thành'
when (select bc.status from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_class` bc where bc.id = bs.booking_class_id) = 4 then 'Hoàn thành'
when (select bc.status from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_class` bc where bc.id = bs.booking_class_id) = 5 then 'Huỷ'
else 'Không có lớp'
end as class_status,
case 
when status_id = 1 then 'Draft'
when status_id = 2 then 'New'
when status_id = 3 then 'WaitingApprove'
when status_id = 4 then 'Approved'
when status_id = 5 then 'Completed'
when status_id = 6 then 'Rejected'
when status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id = 5 then 'Cancelled by kyna without compensate'
when status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id = 6 then 'Cancelled by teacher without compensate'
when status_id = 8 then 'Deleted'
end as booking_status,
(select p.`name` from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p where p.user_id = bs.teacher_id) as teacher_name,
(select count(bss.student_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss where bss.booking_session_id = bs.id) as total_student,
(select sum(revenue) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss where bss.booking_session_id = bs.id) as revenue,
if(bs.total_income is null, 0, ceiling(bs.total_income * 23500)) as teacher_income,
case
  when (select sum(revenue) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss where bss.booking_session_id = bs.id) = 0 and (bs.total_income !=0 or bs.total_income is not null)
  then 100
  else ceiling((bs.total_income * 23500) / (select sum(revenue) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss where bss.booking_session_id = bs.id) * 100) 
end as revenue_teacher_income,
case
when bs.total_income is null then null
when ((select count(bss.student_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss where bss.booking_session_id = bs.id) = 0 and bs.total_income is not null) then ceiling(bs.total_income * 23500)
else ceiling(bs.total_income * 23500)/(select count(bss.student_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss where bss.booking_session_id = bs.id)
end as total_income_chia_total_students,
bs.begin_at
from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session` bs 
where bs.program_id = 5;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.view_learnig_retention_month_location`
AS SELECT 
  DISTINCT(t2.id),
  t2.student_code,
  t2.student_id,
  t2.email,
  t2.minDate,
  t2.learning_date,
  t2.learning_date_1,
  FORMAT_TIMESTAMP("%m/%Y",timestamp_seconds(t2.order_date)) as order_date,
  t2.begin_at,
  t2.revenue,
  t2.center_name,
  t2.user_type,
  t2.birthday,
  (select max(bl.location_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_lead` bl 
    where bl.email = t2.email) as location_id,
  t2.Loai_CT,
  t2.status_id,
  t2.cancel_config_id,
  t2.payment_content
FROM
(
SELECT 
  *,
  (select max(u.email) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u 
    where t1.parent_id = u.id) as email
FROM (
  SELECT 
      bs.id,
      bss.student_id as student_id, 
      case 
        when (select btu.user_type_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` btu 
          where btu.user_id = bss.student_id) = 1 then 'Trẻ em'
        when (select btu.user_type_id from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` btu 
          where btu.user_id = bss.student_id) = 2 then 'Người lớn'
      end as user_type,
      (select max(u.parent_id) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.user` u 
        where u.id = bss.student_id)  as parent_id,
      (select rft.minDate from `kynaforkids-server-production.accounting_kynaforkids.learning_retention_first_time` rft 
        where rft.student_id = bss.student_id) as minDate,
      FORMAT_TIMESTAMP("%m/%Y", bs.begin_at) as learning_date,
      FORMAT_TIMESTAMP("%Y", bs.begin_at) as learning_date_1,
      (select max(bo.accounting_date) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo where 
        bo.student_payment_id = bss.student_payment_id and bo.payment_status = 1 and bo.payment_content in (1,2,3,4)) 
        as order_date,
      bs.begin_at,
      bss.revenue,
      (select t1.name from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_center` t1, 
        `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` t2 
        where bss.student_id = t2.user_id and t2.center_id = t1.id ) as center_name,
    (select max(p.birthday) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.profile` p 
      where p.user_id = bss.student_id) as birthday,
    case 
    when bs.program_id in (14,15,21,22) then 'Group class'
    else '1-1'
    end as Loai_CT,
    case
			when bs.program_id = 1 then 'Kyna English VIP'
			when bs.program_id = 2 then 'Kyna English SPEAK'
			when bs.program_id = 3 then 'Chương trình Demo'
			when bs.program_id = 4 then 'Kyna English Tutorials'
			when bs.program_id = 5 then 'Kyna English Class'
      when bs.program_id = 6 then 'Kyna English Junior'
      when bs.program_id = 7 then 'Kyna English Primary'
      when bs.program_id = 8 then 'Chương trình Test Online'
      when bs.program_id = 9 then 'Kyna English SPEAK JUNIOR'
      when bs.program_id = 10 then 'Kyna English IELTS'
      when bs.program_id = 11 then 'Kyna English Business'
      when bs.program_id = 12 then 'Toán Tiểu Học'
      when bs.program_id = 13 then 'Test Online (2 shifts)'
      when bs.program_id = 14 then 'Kyna English Class Vip'
      when bs.program_id = 15 then 'Kyna English Class Speak' 
      when bs.program_id = 16 then 'Kyna English Secondary'    
      when bs.program_id = 17 then 'Kyna English VIP 45MINS'   
      when bs.program_id = 18 then 'Kyna English SPEAK 45MINS' 
      when bs.program_id = 19 then 'Kyna English Tutorials 45MINS' 
      when bs.program_id = 20 then 'Toán Tiểu Học (Mẫu giáo - Lớp 1 - Lớp 2)' 
      when bs.program_id = 21 then 'KE Public Speaking I' 
      when bs.program_id = 20 then 'KE Public Speaking II' 
	end as program,
  (select bst.student_code from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_student` bst where bst.user_id = bss.student_id) as student_code,
  bs.status_id,
  bs.cancel_config_id,
  case
    when (select min(cast(bo.payment_content as INT64)) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo
    where  bo.student_payment_id = bss.student_payment_id) = 1 then 'Buổi Học thử'
    when (select bph.payment_fee from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_payment_history` bph 
    where bph.id = bss.student_payment_id) = 0  then 'Buổi tặng'
    else 'Buổi Ghi danh'
  end as payment_content
  FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_view` bs
  left join `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bss on bs.id=bss.booking_session_id 
  where bs.program_id not in (3,8,13,47,48,53,54,55,56) 
  -- and (bs.status_id in (1,2,3,4,5) or (bs.status_id = 7 and bs.cancel_config_id in (1,2,4,8))) 
  and 
    (select min(cast(bo.payment_content as INt64)) from `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_order` bo,
    `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.booking_session_student` bst 
    where bst.booking_session_id = bs.id   and bo.student_payment_id = bst.student_payment_id) != 1
    order by bss.student_id desc) t1 ) t2
order by t2.email;

CREATE VIEW `kynaforkids-server-production.datateam_kynaforkids.writing_session_view`
AS SELECT 
        ws.* except(created_at, graded_at),
        timestamp_seconds(created_at) as created_at,
        timestamp_seconds(graded_at) as graded_at, 
FROM `kynaforkids-server-production.kynaforkids.writing_session` ws;
